name: Garden House Bologna
host_about:
Mi chiamo Anna Maria Salizzoni.
Sono insegnante di italiano e latino da pochi anni in pensione. Sono sposata, ho tre figli e, per ora, cinque nipoti, di cui tre in Finlandia, perché mio genero è finlandese. Mi piace cucinare, amo stare all'aria aperta e fare sport (nuoto, sci), in particolare la bicicletta: possiedo bici da corsa, mountain-bike e city-bike che, all'occorrenza, posso prestare, purché ne abbiano riguardo, agli ospiti.
Abito a Bologna nell'appartamento attiguo a Garden House.

name: large, quiet, in front off the the Bologna's fair
description: A comfortable fullyfurnished apartment with three spacious bedrooms that sleep up to 9 guests in comfort, a kitchen equipped with everything, two bathrooms with shower and a covered terrace with a smoking corner.  The structure consisting of three apartments (IN FIERA 5, IN FIERA 8, IN FIERA 14) can accommodate 24 guests in 24 single beds.
neighborhood_overview: Very alive district, adjacent to the old town, the university and the museum with a large presence of university students. There are supermarkets, pharmacies, banks, cash machine, pubs, restaurants, taverns, pizzerias, shops, FICO Eataly World, the largest agro-food park in the world and the fairgrounds.
host_about:
Ho voluto iniziare una piccola attività ricettiva per essere a contatto con le persone di tutto il mondo così, in zona verde e ottimamente servita, a pochi minuti dal centro città e di fronte alla fiera di Bologna affitto, per brevi periodi, deliziosi appartamenti di varie dimensioni, ideali per turisti, uomini d’affari, professionisti.
I set up this small rental business to be in contact with people from all over the world. Situated in a well-serviced area of Bologna, just a few minutes from the city centre, opposite the Bologna Exhibition Centre (Fiera di Bologna), my short-term rental apartments are ideal for tourists, business travellers, professionals.
Ich wollte eine kleinen Unterkunftsbetrieb eröffnen, um mit Personen aus der ganzen Welt in Kontakt zu gelangen: mitten im Grünen und dennoch bestens erreichbar, wenige Minuten vom Stadtzentrum und gegenüber von der Messe in Bologna vermiete ich für kurze Zeiträume wunderschöne Appartements in verschiedenen Größen. Ideal für Touristen, Geschäftsleute, Berufstätige.
Je voulais commencer un hébergement de petite entreprise pour être en contact avec des gens de partout dans le monde, ainsi, dans un endroit  verdoyant et bien desservi, à quelques minutes du centre-ville et en face de la foire de Bologne, pour de courtes périodes, on a beaux appartements de diverses taille, idéal pour les touristes, hommes d’affaires, professionnels, exposants .
He querido emprender esta pequeña actividad de hostelería para poder estar en contacto con personas de todo el mundo, situada en una zona verde  y con excelentes servicios a su alrededor, está ubicada a pocos minutos  del centro de la ciudad y enfrente de la feria de Bolonia (Bologna). Alquilo a corto plazo apartamentos de varias dimensiones, ideales para turistas, ejecutivos, profesionales, expositores

host_about:
Ciao sono Natalie , gestisco l’appartamento per mio marito .
sono felice di accogliere persone nuove provenienti da tutto il mondo e metto una cura particolare nell’accoglienza.
ho viaggiato molto e tuttora mi piace viaggiare, ma so come ci si sente nell’arrivare in una città nuova con la voglia di esplorare ma anche di sentirsi a casa alla sera.
Faccio la guida turistica da 18 anni e ho passione per l’arte e la storia la cucina ma mi dedico molto alla famiglia e ai miei amatissimi animali

name: Bijou House centro storico, free wi-fi, 2 Smart Tv
description: A few steps from the Two Towers, 10 minutes walk from the station and 10 minutes by bus from the Fair, Bijou House is an 80sqm Boutique Apartment on two levels. It is generously equipped and offers a PERSONALIZED WELCOME of a high standard. Double bathroom with shower and bathtub, kitchen with appliances and accessories, living room with vaulted ceiling, air conditioning, independent heating, large double bedroom. Five beds in total. Excellent acoustics for opera singers. Late check-out.
neighborhood_overview: "Bijou House Bologna - Boutique Apartment" is surrounded by bars, restaurants, taverns and summer markets, shops and supermarkets. It really is all at hand. Just below the house there is a delicious pastry shop for breakfast and a multi-award winning bar for aperitif. In summer, a few meters away, the so-called "Jazz Lounge" is set up outdoors, and not infrequently the Teatro Comunale organizes free concerts in the foyer. The characteristic neighborhood of the former Jewish "ghetto" is located a few meters away, as well as the "Two Towers". Piazza Maggiore is just 500 meters away. The area also lends itself to the most unrestrained shopping: from the luxury and branded one of Galleria Cavour, via Farini and via D'Azeglio, to the most accessible (Zara, H&M, Zara Home, etc.), from the characteristic gastronomic one of the "Mercato di Mezzo", a riot of colors and flavors, to the gastronomic/cultural one of Eataly.
host_about:
"Questa casa non è un albergo" è il mio motto. Far sentire gli ospiti come a casa loro, il mio obiettivo. Ho cercato di far tesoro di tutte quelle piccole o grandi cose che hanno reso i miei viaggi o le mie vacanze meno piacevoli di quanto avrebbero potuto essere: una colazione misera, un letto troppo piccolo o troppo duro, una stanza rumorosa o in cui trapelava la luce mattutina, un box doccia minuscolo, l'asciugacapelli adatto ad un bimbo, non certo ai preziosissimi capelli di una donna, e potrei continuare... e sulla scorta delle mie esperienze ho allestito un appartamento su misura per viaggiatori molto esigenti. Ogni ospite ha un'accoglienza personalizzata, basata sui propri gusti, le proprie preferenze e le caratteristiche del proprio viaggio.
Bologna è una città meravigliosa, immeritatamente meno nota di altre città d'arte italiane. E' vivace, accogliente, ricca di sapori, odori e colori. 
Il mio appartamento è situato in una zona del centro storico perfetta per scoprire la città in tutti i suoi risvolti: da quello artistico, a quello gastronomico, da quello della musica, a quello della vivacità della vita studentesca dell'Alma Mater, la più antica Università del mondo, datata 1088.
La mia ospitalità sarà gentile e generosa, come la persona che cerco di essere ogni giorno. 
Cristina

name: Z8 Terra - Comfortable two bedrooms apartment
description:
Fully equipped flat consisting of two large double bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen and balcony.
Strategic location, perfect for holiday or work, one step away from the city centre and close to the station and all connections to the fair and the airport. In a very quiet street but in an area well served by bars, restaurants, supermarkets and shops.
We have other flats in the same building.
neighborhood_overview:
The street we are on is very quiet and quiet but in the surrounding streets you can find everything you need: grocery stores and supermarkets, bars and restaurants, pubs and much more.
Roads around the house are not accessible by car during the day (7-20). Less than 5 minutes walk there is the cheapest car park in the historic center, “Garage Autostazione”, about 18€/24h.
The apartment enjoys a particularly strategic location:
- 10 minutes walk from the Central Train Station, where you can also find the BLQ bus stops to and from the airport;
- 10 minutes walk from the university area;
- 15 minutes walk from Piazza Maggiore and the two towers;
- 20 minutes walk from the Bologna Fair (you can also reach it by bus: the stop is just a few minutes walk)
host_about:
Ciao! Io e il mio compagno Jacopo saremo i vostri host: entrambi di Bologna amiamo la buona cucina e parlare di cibo, amiamo i libri e i gatti. Amiamo anche il mare, ma quello purtroppo a Bologna ancora non c'è!
Hi! My partner Jacopo and I will be your hosts: both born in Bologna, we love cuisine and talk about food, we love books and cats. We love the sea too, but it's not there in Bologna so far!

name: A casa di zoe | in the heart of BO
description:
The house is located in Via San Felice 9, really near to city center.
Layout: double room, triple room, living or another double room, n.3 bathrooms, kitchen and little terrace.
We will be happy to help you with information for dinner, transfer, rental bike, food tour...

*City tax will be to pay at the check out by cash or by request on airbnb.
(4,20 Euro person/night - no child under 14Y)
***AIRBNB doesn't collect City tax for Professional Hosts***
neighborhood_overview:
Via San Felice is located in the" Porto district" of Bologna.
Historically important area for the waterways,
once used so much to nickname Bologna - "the little Venice".
Today it is an elegant and quiet neighborhood, but for those who want a bit of movida in the evening, never miss, in Via del Pratello between osterie and restaurants.

***What I love to do around Via San Felice...

Breakfast:
Felicity Bar
Pasticceria Gamberini

Lunch & dinner:

Street Food

Indegno _ crescentine 2.0

host_about:
Laura, mamma di Zoe.
"Milanese di nascita, Bolognese per amore."
Ho lasciato il mio lavoro presso un’azienda di moda per fare la mamma e insieme a Stefania, zia di Zoe, mi prendo cura dei nostri ospiti.

'L'appartamento è un dono, che un giorno spero di poter lasciare a mia figlia, Zoe. Sino a quel momento, ho pensato di aprire le porte...mi piace l’idea che la casa si arricchisca di vite altrui. Mi auguro che chi passerà di qui, possa tenerne conto e averne cura.”

name: Casa Rosa in the historic centre
description: Located at the second and top floor of a 14th century building of historical charm, this cosy  flat plunges its guests in the life of the ancient city, throbbing with history, art and culture.
neighborhood_overview:
You dont need a car staying in Casa Rosa, just walk: out of the mail door, turn left and in 100 meters you'll be at Portici dei Servi and in 500 meters at Piazza Santo Stefano and its seven churches.
At two minutes walk, Piazza Aldovrandi market is open every day.
host_about: I live in the North of Europe. I love Bologna, its history in every brick of the houses, the chats of the children coming out of school at noon ... Every now and then I come here to breath this atmosphere. I hope you'll share my enthusiasm and will enjoy your stay here.

name: Roomy & Cozy Apt X 6! Prime Location!
description:
Wide and bright 90 sqm apartment located on the fourth floor of a period building (without lift), completely renovated, in the historic center, just a few steps away from Piazza Maggiore, in the main shopping street.
The apartment, excellent for 6 guests, consists of a living room and kitchenette, two bedrooms and a bathroom.
neighborhood_overview:
The area is perfectly connected to all parts of the city. In addition to the many attractions of the historic center (Torre Asinelli, Piazza Maggiore, the Morandi Museum, Modern Art Museum, Piazza delle Sette Chiese Piazza San Francesco), you can walk through all the most characteristic streets of the historical center, stopping to taste food and wine of excellent quality. If you want to be surrounded by nature, you can easily reach the famous Giardini Margherita.
If you are in Bologna for business, the fairground can be reached by bus in 20 minutes.
The S'orsola-Malpighi University Hospital is a 15-minute walk from the property.

Among the main points of interest:
- The Two Towers: 8 minutes on foot;
- Basilica of San Petronio: 7 minutes on foot;
- Piazza Maggiore: 5 minutes on foot;
- National Gallery (Pinacoteca Nazionale): 10 minutes on foot;
- MAMbo (Museum of Modern Art): 13 minutes on foot;
- S'orsola-Malpighi University Hospital
host_about:
It's our great pleasure to host travelers from all over the world in our great apartments in Bologna. Hospitality isn’t just a service, it’s our philosophy and way of life, made of acts of kindness. 
Our Team is here to assist you and offer selected tips and arrange for you experiences off the beaten track. 
And, if you are arranging a trip in more different cities, then ask us for tips and accommodations! We have lots of properties in Italy! Team CleanBnB

name: Two steps to Fiera of Bologna
description: A simple apartment, equipped of all, with functional kitchen, bathroom warm and comfortable rooms. They provide the towels of different sizes, blankets season always washed, disinfected, dried with commercial clothes dryer, check with each new entry. You will find 4 beds made of untreated natural pine wood. This will drastically reduces the possibility of allergic rhinitis or crisis during rest.
neighborhood_overview: The historic district "Bolognina" has always been a small island of workers, to those who get up early in the morning to go home at night. Now to remember the turmoil of those years remains the housing "Casaralta", where our national pride industrial churned out heavy engineering of all types, from train cars to entire tram steam and electricity. But something is changing! The excitement is rising again as evidenced by the opening of 'namesake bar in via Serra. Bolognina reopen the places, restaurants, shops, it discovers that it is better to turn a bike instead of by car. But there are also the tigelle with Bolognese sauce, tortellini and lasagna and more. Not to mention that at a stone's throw away you are at the fair and in 10 minutes by bus in the center of Bologna!
host_about: Ciao, mi chiamo Flavia Dimauro ed assieme a mio marito Pier Luigi gestisco in modo professionale questa bellissima attività. All'inizio di questa avventura non pensavamo assolutamente di diventare imprenditori...

host_about:
Hi there, 
You probably already know my name, so I would like to tell you something more about me. Are you ready?
After completing my degree in Architecture, I worked for 2 years as interior designer, but I didn’t quite enjoy working in an office environment, so I became a freelance with the purpose to realize objects in wood, paper, plastic, leather, fabric. I became very passionate about everything ‘handmade’.

I have always enjoyed the encounter with new people, cultures and lifestyles and for this reason I have travelled extensively between Europe, Middle and Far East (Japan, China, Iran, Israel), learning a huge amount from the different encounters I had. 

I have always been fascinated by what happens in the process of catching the eye of someone who is different from myself.  I very much enjoy opening up to new experiences and discover what’s beyond the appearance. 

I carry a desire to find beauty through art, which takes me to be creative and passionate in my daily life. I love art as a whole, from video and visual art, through poetry, drama, graphics and finally music. 

I would like to offer a service that is really person-centered and I genuinely want to be there for my guests. I firmly believe that true hospitality brings a healthy and nourishing exchange between human beings, and I am very much looking forward to meet you and make you feel welcomed by offering the best I can to each of you. 



Ciao a tutti! Il mio nome già lo conoscete, allora vi dico qualcosa in più di me. Siete pronti!! Dopo gli studi in Architettura ed il conseguimento dell'abilitazione, ho lavorato per due anni occupandomi di " interior design", ma sebbene sia progettista il lavoro d'ufficio non faceva per me, quindi mi sono lanciata nella realizzazione di oggetti in legno, carta, stoffa, plastica, e cuoio, coltivando la passione per tutto ciò che è "handmade".
Il contatto con gli altri, la loro cultura, le loro origini e stili di vita, mi ha spinto negli anni a viaggiare tanto, tra Europa e Oriente (Giappone, Cina, Iran, Israele) imparando molto da loro. I tanti volti incontrati mi dicono sguardi: sguardi che si ricevono, che vengono a me, che mi prendono di mira. Essere davanti ad un volto significa in primo luogo essere sotto uno sguardo; aprirsi ad un mondo perché esso stesso è incontro di un mondo.
L'Arte e la sua Bellezza in qualche modo sono sempre con me ed io in cambio metto a suo servizio la mia creatività e passione. Nell'Arte metto tutto ciò che essa comprende ( poesia, "video art", "visual art", grafica, pittura, teatro, musica).
Ne sono una ricercatrice attenta. Che dire se non: fare della propria vita quello che si proclama.
Ecco che il servizio che vorrei offrire va alla persona ed è per la persona nei limiti delle mie possibilità: io ci sono. Offrire il meglio che oggi può sembrare poco, ma un domani sarà di più. Infine credo fermamente che ospitalità sia sinonimo di accoglienza reciproca.
Giunti al termine di questo breve racconto, spero d'incontrarvi un giorno.
Grazie.

name: Romantic apartment on the roof
description: Suggestive and spacious (140m) attic apartment. Delightful terrace rooftops, 2 double bedrooms (+ sofa bed), 2 bathrooms, large living area and fully equipped kitchen. in the Old Town center, in the heart of the nightlife, but very quiet.
neighborhood_overview:
The university area is very lively and full of shops, bars and restaurants. In the street of teh apartment, you’ll find a multiplex cinema as well as the two most famous jazz clubs of Bologna with live music every night. The house, however, is extremely quiet because it overlooks completely on the inside.
Food in Bologna is a serious matter: a few doors by, you’ll find the pizzeria which is considered by many the best in town, in front of the house the historic trattoria "Annamaria" famous for its tagliatelle, and a few meters from the house several restaurants, osterie, ice cream shops.
host_about: We are a couple around 40, we both work in social research. I'm an anthropologist at University of Torino and my husband a researcher for the European Union in the field of education. We live between Bologna and Torino, we travel a lot both for work and for pleasure, we love to exchange experience and discover other cultures!

name: Funtanir Rooms, Bologna center
description: The flat is a refurbished former hydraulic warehouse developed on two floors (ground and first). It has 6 bedrooms, each of them has its own private bathroom; plus a large living room with kitchen, a bright patio and cosy little terrace.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet but offers a lot in terms of attractions and services. We are in the historical center of Bologna, so in close proximity you can find restaurants, cinemas, supermarket, pharmacies and any kind of shopping venues. The train station is a 10 minute walk away; from there you can get to Florence in 35 minutes, Milan in 1 hour, or Rome in 2 hours via high speed trains. Moreover, the house is in a non controlled traffic zone (unlike most of the historical centre), so you can reach us by car as well. Right in front of us there’s a big public parking, and a private multi-storey car park with more than 500 spaces.
host_about:
Amiamo viaggiare, e conoscere persone è parte del divertimento! 
Passione per musica e arte, ci piace lavorare con materiali e oggetti, recuperandoli o stravolgendone completamente il senso e l'utilizzo.

Comfortable apartment on the fourth floor (with elevator) in a quiet condominium in front of the new entrance of Bologna Central Station.
Just a five-minute walk from Independence Street and the city center.
A fifteen-minute walk from Bologna Fiere. Ideal for small groups, for those traveling by train, convenient for those who reach the city by car and very convenient for those arriving by plane (Marconi Express terminus to and from the airport).
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is close to the center and all its attractions.
A few minutes walk you can reach bars and cafes for a great breakfast and a quick lunch.
Behind starts La Bolognina, a young, multi-ethnic and evolving neighborhood, where there are various clubs, bars and restaurants as well as two large parks and two traditional metropolitan urban markets.
host_about:
Amiamo viaggiare e conoscere nuove persone, utilizziamo Airbnb dal 2013 come Ospiti e dal 2015 come Host, abbiamo avuto come Guest splendide esperienze, ed è così che abbiamo deciso anche noi di condividere queste esperienze con voi viaggiatori! Gestendo più appartamenti in diverse zone della nostra bella città sapremo consigliarvi i luoghi che rendono per noi Bologna così speciale.
"Come as a traveler, leave as a friend"  :-)

Residence Petronio is ideal for a couple or family holiday, but also for business trips for which you are looking for elegant environments in central locations.

name: Casa di TonyMan
description:
Welcome to our spacious apartment located just two kilometers from the heart of Bologna.
With two cozy bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, modern bathroom, TV area, and dining room, you'll want for nothing during your stay.
Take advantage of the convenient bus stop just 50 meters away to explore the city. Breakfast and private parking are included in your stay for a stress-free experience.
Local taxes are not included and must be paid at check-in.
neighborhood_overview:
Residential area. Recommended certainly a walk to the Basilica of Our Lady of San Luca.
Undoubtedly the best ‘Portico’ walk you can do in the city is the one up to Madonna di San Luca. The walk is under the cover of the Porticos all the way from the city centre and is around 3.5km long with 666 arches. It took many years to complete the full portico walkway work originally began in 1674 and it wasn’t completed until 1732.

The sanctuary at the Madonna di San Luca in Bologna, Emilia Romagna
Today along the way you will meet many locals who make this a regular walk or even use it for a fitness work out by running up to the top followed by a gentle stroll back down. There is also a yearly procession from the Cathedral San Pietro in the centre of Bologna up to the sanctuary of San Luca following the portico walkway.

name: Quiet flat with Private Free Garage outside ztl
description: Two bedrooms flat, in the most elegant area of town, close to all main tourist attractions, easily accessible by walk, bus or by car, with private indoor parking space. The ideal accommodation for travelling families or for business journeys.
neighborhood_overview:
The area, elegant and strategic, is safe and quiet, with shacks, ice cream parlors, new clubs and ancient taverns.
In the morning, if you like to have breakfast in bed, just ask your sweetheart to put on a pair of shoes and cross the street: bars, patisseries, bakeries, you choose.
It's impossible to get lost. To get to and from downtown, just go: always straight.
It's hard to stay within a 10-minute walk and be able to get into the shops, churches, and clubs that take the walk downtown.
host_about:
Io corro.
Ma mica per tenermi in forma. 
Corro la mattina appena sveglia per preparare colazioni, zaini e merende. 
Corro per la strada mentre, in ritardo, cerco di raggiungere l'ufficio.
Corro al supermercato quando provo a organizzare una cena che farà comunque orrore alla maggior parte dei commensali. 
Corro la sera, quando cerco di sistemare e rassettare, per sprofondare in un meritato sonno da divano.
Sì, insomma: io corro. Praticamente sul posto. Senza arrivare mai da nessuna parte.
Airbnb sarà l'occasione per conoscere persone in questa folle e veloce e piena corsa dentro la vita che mi sono costruita!

PS Al supermercato io sono quella che annusa tutti i detersivi per lavatrice e ammorbidenti. Il ricordo di un profumo, come quello delle lenzuola, è importante.

name: Wagon-Lit an entire house in the centre of Bologna
description:
We present our private house, which, after careful renovation in 2019, was born Wagon-Lit.
Four independent rooms with access to a private courtyard, a unique place in terms of quality of service and courteous staff, where you can enjoy a relaxing stay, full of fun, rest and excellent cuisine.
neighborhood_overview: A quiet neighborhood, convenient to all services "supermarkets, banks, pharmacies, restaurants" we are close to the Sant 'Orsola Hospital, and if one wants to stay in the quiet room you can order food at all hours directly to through the Glovo, JustEat, MyMenu applications
host_about:
Wagon-lit e la nostra casa privata dove abbiamo realizzato quattro camere di lusso, ognuna con splendidi letti matrimoniali o singoli, tutte con bagni privati, arredate con il cuore
Si trova nella tranquillità di Bologna, un posto favoloso per rilassarsi e distendersi in pace ma nello stesso tempo al centro della città.

Le camere sono tutte climatizzate, armadio e connessione WiFi gratuita, macchina da caffè, frigo, microonde, bagno privato e TV a schermo piatto, insonorizzate e dotate di vista sul giardino,

Due camere sono fornite di cucina attrezzate dove poter cenare con tranquillità o se si vuole mangiare in giardino anche con i propri amici o animali.

Wagon-Lit è la base ideale per te e il tuo partner, situato nel centro pulsante della città, a sua volta vicini a Firenze, Venezia, Verona, Modena,Parma, Padova.

Wagon-Lit e ideale con gli amici o soli con il proprio patner per rilassarsi e gustare del buon cibo e del buon vino dove "La Grassa Bologna" non si smentisce mail.

name: LA SUITE NEL BORGHETTO PANIGALE
description:
In the old part of BORGHETTO PANIGALE we have finely renovated this comfortable two-room apartment that can accommodate up to 6 guests!
The beautiful vaults returned to the original and the evocative splendour of the numerous light points will add that extra touch!
neighborhood_overview:
Getting there is convenient both by public transport (train / plane) and by car.

Borghetto Panigale is only 2.8 km from the AIRPORT; it is close to the Borgo Panigale TRAIN STATION, which leads to the central station in just 6 minutes!
It is 15 minutes from the Bologna FAIR as it is very close to the entrances of THE RING ROAD.

The BUS stop is just around the corner, and connects the apartment with the CENTER of Bologna and the AIRPORT.
Bus 13, which leads downtown, runs every 10 minutes from 5.00 am to 1:00 am.
Bus 54 allows you to reach the airport in exactly 10 minutes! (does not run on Sundays).
For your convenience in the apartment you will find the timetables.

By BUS you can also reach the BUS STATION, the CENTRAL STATION and THE FAIR, but we suggest you use the very convenient surface train to reduce travel times. (In the apartment you will find the timetable).

neighborhood_overview:
This gorgeous venue guarantees a memorable stay and is a stone's throw from the heart of the historical centre of Bologna: Piazza Maggiore. The area is filled with a myriad of small handicraft shops and historic inns, it is also possible to savour the very best of local food and wine or go shopping for local produce. The shopping area boasts a full-bodied array of produce which includes fresh handmade pasta made daily, the best cuts of meat, traditional sausages, fish of the Adriatic Sea and locally grown vegetables: everything is available within walking distance from home.

We are precisely located in the middle of the old medieval city. Piazza Maggiore is the main square of Bologna and is encircled by the most important buildings of the city. The most ancient is Palazzo Podesta, which dates back to 1200 and is surmounted by the Tower dell'Arengo, which by the ringing of its bells gestures all the people in the vicinity to gather together. name: Corner Residence 1
description: The apartment is located in a very quiet area and well served by public transport exactly between the railway station (450 meters) and the exhibition center (1.4 km), both easily reachable on foot. In the area it is easy to find parking on the streets near the apartment. The city center can be reached by bus 27, or with a walk of about twenty minutes.  For the Fair you can use Bus 25. The PAM supermarket is just 200 meters away.
neighborhood_overview: The Bolognina neighborhood is the historic working-class district of old Bologna. This is where the first major factories in the region developed (Minganti, Sasib, Officine Casaralta). Factories that no longer exist today and have left their factories for other activities: shopping malls, gyms, and residential areas. So a quiet but at the same time absolutely strategic neighborhood given its proximity to Fiera, Stazione Ferroviaria, Ospedale S.Orsola and Villa Erbosa. Piazza Maggiore can also be reached on foot and a 15-minute drive to the airport.

description: Cosy and spacious 70 sq.m attic apartment in the historic center of Bologna | Ideal for couples, families with childrens, group of friends, up to 6 persons | Living room, small kitchen, two bedrooms and bathroom  | WI-FI, Air Conditioning, Dishwasher | At ten minute walk from Piazza Maggiore and the two Towers | In a silent road | Restaurants, bars, shops, market, public parking for car, bus stops for and from the Central Railway Station at 2 minutes walk | Safe neighborhood |

There's many shops of all kind very close to the apartment : a small market with fresh fruits and vegetables, supermarket, pharmacy, bars, pasticcerias, bakeries and also pizzerias and trattorias and restaurants where you can taste the typical dishes of the traditional Bolognese cuisine.

Almost all points of interest of Bologna are located in the historic center and can be reached by walk from the apartment.

In ten-minute walk you can also reach the beautiful public park "Giardini Margherita", enjoyed by the childrens and the citizens of Bologna, with its meadows and tree-lined avenues, pond, ice cream shops and restaurant.

The area where the flat is located is also at the foot of the hills of Bologna and nearby Rizzoli Orthopedic Institute Hospital and the Church of San Michele in Bosco from wich you can see a beautiful panorama of the city.
host_about:
We are two sisters owners of the apartment MURA CASTIGLIONE HOME and we love our city very much! We love our family, art and life.
With the help of our husbands Luca and Fulvio we offer you a stay in our apartment giving you the chance to make a dive in the historic center of the city of Bologna.
A heartfelt thanks to you passing tourists that will leave us a little piece of your culture.

Siamo due sorelle proprietarie dell'appartamento MURA CASTIGLIONE HOME e amiamo moltissimo la nostra città! Amiamo la famiglia, l'arte e la vita.  Con l'aiuto dei nostri mariti Luca e Fulvio offriamo un soggiorno nel nostro appartamento dandovi la possibilità di fare un'immersione nel centro storico della città di Bologna.
Un grazie di cuore a voi turisti di passaggio che ci lascerete un pezzettino della vostra cultura.

neighborhood_overview: Pratello is an area of the historic center of Bologna, located on the northern border of the Zaragoza district, which takes its name and branches off around Via del Pratello, an ancient porticoed road of about 600 meters. Lively popular neighborhood. In this area there are also some craft shops, vintage clothing, food, various design activities, furniture, publishing, graphics, a web TV, Europa Cinema and some theater companies.

name: Corner Residence 3
description: The apartment is in a very quiet area and well served by public transport exactly between the railway station (450 meters) and the exhibition center (1.4 km), both easily reachable on foot. Below the house there is easily parking at a cost of 6 euros per night. The city center can be reached by bus 27, or a twenty-minute walk. For the Fair you can use the Bus 25. The PAM supermarket is just 200 meters away.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is the historic working-class neighborhood of old Bologna. This is where the first major factories in the region were developed (Minganti, Sasib, Officine Casaralta). Factories that no longer exist and have left their establishments to other activities: malls, gyms and residential areas. Therefore, a quiet neighborhood but at the same time absolutely strategic given the proximity to Fiera, Railway Station, S.Orsola Hospital and Villa Erbosa. Piazza Maggiore is also within walking distance, and the airport is just a 15-minute drive.

description:
The apartment is in the center. From home you will easily reach any part of the city walking.

The apartment has been completely renewed in 2016, it is completely furnished by new.

neighborhood_overview:
Our name is Bologna's heart for a reason. From the house other than the many shops, bars, coffee shops, restaurants etc...you can walk around and get amused by all the churches, statues and historical buildings that make Bologna one of the oldest fascinating and romantic cities of Italy.
Everywhere you go you will find traditional restaurants as well as international restaurants and stopping by Galleria Cavour you can enjoy shopping at our luxury brand names stores like Gucci, Prada, Bottega Veneta, Armani and many more.
All there is left to do is see it for yourself.
We will be happy to answer any of your questions, so please don't hesitate to ask.

name: The Rose's flat, 10 min walk far from the center!
description: The flat is situated on hill side,  10 minutes walk far from the city center. Easily reachable by bus and 5 minutes walk up  the hill or by car (private parking space). You will feel in the country even if you are less than 1km far from the shops and the city life! if you book for 2 people you will have all the flat for you but only one bedroom available, for 3 or 4 people you will have only 2 bedrooms available. If you are 3 and you need the 3 bedrooms you have to book at least for 5 people.
neighborhood_overview:
The accommodation is located in one of the most exclusive reserved areas of Bologna a few steps from the green of the Margherita gardens and from Porta Castiglione and
we are outside the ZTL zone.
Carrefour Express at 600 meters open 24 hours/ 24 hours.
Porta Castiglione could be called the "Gate of the canals" because next to it entered the city the Savena canal which with its branches provided hydraulic energy and its driving force to dozens and dozens of factories in which both wool and silk worked. It was built in the thirteenth century and renovated several times during the fourteenth, in particular between and 1403. To bring it to its current appearance, there was also a restoration promoted by the Municipality in 1850.
Porta Castiglione was not mentioned in the Descriptio of Cardinal Anglico in 1371, probably because it was temporarily inactive.

host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is the immediate vicinity of the old medieval town. Strada Maggiore is one of the main routes leading to Torre degli Asinelli and, from there, to Piazza Maggiore. The property is located in the luxurious setting of Palazzo Mattei, residence of the Mattei family and laboratory of electro-homeopathy products until 1969, when the descendants of this dynasty permanently moved to Milan. To those who want to deepen their knowledge of this noble Bologna dynasty, whose most illustrious ancestor, scientist and alchemist Cesare Mattei, founded his own peculiar medical science - applied, among others to the Tsar of Russia and Princess Sissi of Austria - we recommend booking a visit to Rocchetta Mattei, a large monumental complex nestled in the Bologna hills.

Today, the seat of the University is less than a 5-minute walk from the apartment, on Via Zamboni, where the Municipal Theatre is located, an artistic institution famous for its rich Opera season calendar. Among the

- MAMbo (Museum of Modern Art): 20 minutes by public transport;
- Torre degli Asinelli: 26 minutes by public transport;
- Piazza Maggiore: 24 minutes by public transport;

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in an elegant area of the city. Born from renovations of apartments located 50 meters from Via Mazzini and Via Emilia Levante, roads traced in Roman times and that divide exactly into two parts of similar size, the historic center of Bologna, Bologna Dream Bed & Breakfast - Apartments is the ideal solution for those who want to enjoy the scents, flavors and history of Bologna. The fifty-year experience of the Property in the field of leases for short and long periods of time, of the apartments that are located in this small, pretty and quiet condominium located in Via Dei Maceri n. 11/3 Cap 40139 Bologna (Via Mazzini – Pontevecchio), is a guarantee of reliability, care and continuous attention to the needs of customers and the provision of an efficient and quality service, which the market has recognized us for decades.
"Why choose Bologna Dream Bed & Breakfast - Apartments?"
If you want to visit the city... with a 25-minute walk through the streets
host_about:
Cinque cose di cui non posso fare a meno: 1) Famiglia 2) Lavoro 3) Vacanze 4) Libri 5) Buon cibo (Pasta, Pizza, ecc).
Nato da ristrutturazioni di appartamenti collocati a 50 metri da Via Mazzini e da Via Emilia Levante, strade tracciate in epoca romana e che dividono esattamente in due parti di ampiezza simile, il centro storico di Bologna, Bologna Dream B&B - Short Lets Apartments è la soluzione ideale per chi desidera godersi i profumi, i sapori e la storia di Bologna. L’esperienza cinquantennale della Proprietà nel campo delle locazioni per brevi e lunghi periodi di tempo, degli appartamenti che si collocano in questo piccolo, grazioso e tranquillo condomìnio posto in Via Dei Maceri n. 11/3 Cap 40139 Bologna (Zona Via Mazzini – Pontevecchio), è garanzia di affidabilità, cura ed attenzione continua alle esigenze della clientela e della fornitura di un servizio efficiente e di qualità, che il mercato ci riconosce da decenni.
"Perchè scegliere Bologna Dream B&B - Short Lets Apartments?"
Se vuoi visitare la città... con una passeggiata a piedi di 25 minuti tra le vie del centro storico della Città di Bologna, puoi raggiungere le principali bellezze della città: le Due Torri, Piazza Maggiore con la Basilica di San Petronio, le Sette Chiese in Via Santo Stefano, Piazza Verdi con il Teatro Comunale, la Pinacoteca Nazionale, il Museo Civico Archeologico, il Convento di San Domenico, il Collegio di Spagna, la Biblioteca dell’ Archiginnasio con il suo Teatro Anatomico che è uno dei più antichi d’Europa, l’Archiginnasio che era la sede originaria dell’ antica Università risalente al 1088, i suoi innumerevoli canali sotterranei e molte altre attrazioni del centro storico di Bologna. Bologna Dream B&B - Short Lets Apartments si trova inoltre a soli 12 minuti a piedi dal Policlinico Universitario Ospedaliero di fama internazionale Sant’ Orsola – Malpighi.
Se vieni per una festa di laurea o per altre attività legate all'Università... Bologna Dream B&B - Short Lets Apartments si trova a circa 2 km dalla zona universitaria con le sue numerose facoltà, alla quale è collegata con diverse linee di bus in 10 minuti. Le fermate dei Bus numero 19 e 27, si trovano a 50 metri dal complesso immobiliare di Bologna Dream B&B - Short Lets Apartments. Alla medesima distanza di 50 metri, si trova la nuova metropolitana di superficie, nata da una ristrutturazione della originaria linea ferroviaria Bologna – Firenze, tramite la quale è possibile raggiungere in 5 minuti la stazione centrale dei treni e dei bus turistici di Bologna, nonché la stazione centrale dei bus diretti verso tutte le destinazioni nazionali ed internazionali.
Se ti rechi a Bologna per motivi sanitari... potrai facilmente raggiungere a piedi, in soli 12 minuti l'Ospedale Sant'Orsola - Malpighi, la casa di cura Villa Laura mentre, con l’auto, in soli 10  minuti potrai invece raggiungere l’Ospedale Bellaria. E' inoltre possibile raggiungere l'Istituto Ortopedico Rizzoli, con una corsa bus di 30 minuti oppure in auto in 10 minuti. Inoltre la posizione a soli 800 metri dall’Ospedale Sant’Orsola - Malpighi, dà la possibilità di accogliere parenti dei degenti, medici, paramedici, operatori scientifici operanti all’ interno della struttura.  
Se ti rechi a Bologna per partecipare ad un evento fieristico... il polo Bologna Fiere dista poco più di 3 km. Facilmente raggiungibile in auto in 10 minuti e con i mezzi di trasporto pubblici. 
Oltre al vantaggio di un'ottima posizione per qualsiasi meta da raggiungere a Bologna, si assicura la possibilità per turisti e non, di alloggiare in ambienti puliti, accoglienti e silenziosi, ad un ottimo prezzo, con ampia disponibilità di parcheggio pubblico gratuito in zona.

name: Azeglio apartment, neighboring Piazza Maggiore
description: Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms that can accommodate up to 6 people in total comfort. Located a few steps from Piazza Maggiore, at the beginning of Via D'Azeglio, the most prestigious street in the city, it allows you to visit the city and its main attractions easily by moving on foot.
neighborhood_overview: We are exactly in the center of the old medieval city, adjacent to Piazza Maggiore. Piazza Maggiore is the main square of Bologna and is surrounded by the most important buildings of the city: Palazzo Podestà, which dates back to 1200, Palazzo Re Enzo, Palazzo d'Accursio, a monumental architectural complex of fourteenth-century origin, currently the headquarters of the Municipality of Bologna. The last side of the square is embellished by the Basilica of San Petronio, an example of Italian Gothic, begun at the end of the fourteenth century and still unfinished. Palazzo Banchi marks the beginning of the most famous portico of the city, the Pavaglione, which connects Piazza Maggiore to the Palazzo dell'Archiginnasio, the first headquarters of the University of Bologna: the oldest in the world. Today the headquarters of the University is less than 10 minutes walk from the apartment, in via Zamboni, half of which belongs to the Teatro Comunale.

host_about:
Ciao che dire di me....queste cose mettono sempre un po' in imbarazzo! Comunque sono un tipo socievole e alla mano, amo la semplicità delle cose e nei rapporti. Sono chiara e diretta, sensibile e dolce, ma all'occasione so essere una vera forza! Prevalentemente allegra e solare! 
Sono felice di partecipare come Host alla comunità di Airbnb condividere i miei spazi e più che altro conoscere nuove persone per arricchire il mio animo. 
Adoro cucinare, più che altro sperimentare nuove ricette, nuovi piatti. Mi piace mangiare nei ristoranti e sono sempre alla ricerca di nuovi posti e di nuovi sapori(che saprò consigliarvi!)
Se passate per vacanze o lavoro contattateci.!

name: UR-NEST Testoni - Luxury Collection
description: Elegant and modern two bedroom mansard apartment for vacation rentals in Bologna, located on the third and last floor of a typical medieval building (without elevator) in the historical center, at a few steps from Piazza Maggiore.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the heart of Bologna historical center, in the area surrounding Piazza Maggiore (S. Petronio church - one of the most important churches of the world -, Palazzo D’Accursio, Museo Morandi, Palazzo Re Enzo, Museo Civico), Piazza Nettuno with the beautiful fountain by Gianbologna and the former Sala Borsa, seat of an important multimedia library, and the Two towers, dating back to 1100. This is the fulcrum of the city and in the vicinity is a myriad of alleys with colourful street markets, pubs, trendy nightspots and typical or historical shops.
Close to the apartment is an elegant restaurant, renowned for char-grilled fish and meat, one of the most famous bar-patisseries of Bologna, various shops (among which a pharmacy at the corner with Via Ugo Bassi) and a supermarket at about 200 metres.

An ancient meeting place for bolognese nobility, Kutir was renovated in 2008, by a famous Bolognese architect following the style of Antonioni's iconic film Blow Up.

Portobello Apartments Interno 3 is a cozy 90 sqm apartment on two levels recently renovated in the center of Bologna. Located in a quiet and peaceful interior in a strategic location: just 950 meters from the heart of the city and 750 meters from the train station.

Portobello Apartments: to visit Bologna with the comforts of home!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the central area of Bologna a few meters from taxi and aurobus stops, 750 meters from the central station and 950 meters from the heart of the city with its beautiful monuments and shopping streets.
4 km from the fair, 8 km from FICO Eataly World, 8 km from Margoni Airport and a few km from the main hospitals (Ospedale Maggiore 4 km, Sant'Orsola-Malpighi 5 km, Rizzoli 4 km).
In the immediate vicinity 3 supermarkets, numerous restaurants, bars and shops.
The strategic location of Portobello Apartment Interno 3, given its proximity to the railway station (7 minutes on foot) allows you to visit many cities of central and northern Italy such as Florence, Venice, Verona, Padua, Milan, Parma, Reggio Emilia, Modena, Ferrara, Rimini, Mantua.

The apartment consists of living room with sofa and TV includes a kitchen equipped with induction fires, oven, microwave, Nespresso, dishwasher, washer and dryer. Both bedrooms have wardrobes and desks. Air conditioning and mosquito nets and smoke sensors throughout the house. Two bedrooms with double bed both with private bathroom. Including the provision of bath and bed linen, and internet.
neighborhood_overview: Oriani 20 is a delightful apartment, recently renovated, with two double bedrooms overlooking an internal courtyard, each with a private bathroom. The apartment is on the upper floor of a historic Bologna building and is in an excellent position with respect to the centre of Bologna: easily accessible from the central station and the airport, as well as if travelling by car. Viale Oriani is a tree-lined avenue just outside the circle of the walls within the Santo Stefano district: one of the most elegant areas of the city that houses some of the main historical sites in Bologna. Restaurants, clubs, cinemas, theatres, museums, and of course the University of Studies are all within walking distance. The apartment enjoys a privileged location as the building is located near the historic center but also a few steps from the largest park in the city, the Margherita Gardens and 400 meters from the Sant'Orsola-Malpighi hospital pole.

neighborhood_overview:

The Music Museum is 100 meters from home. All the other museums in Bologna are within walking distance: Museo dell 'Archiginnasio, Museo del Risorgimento, Museo Civico Medievale as well as the house of the painter Giorgio Morandi and the singer Lucio Dalla.

name: Symphony 12, dimora di charme su storica piazza
description: The apartment overlooks Piazza Aldrovandi, a lively place in the historic center of Bologna. It is a short walk from the two towers, Piazza Maggiore and Via Zamboni where the University is located. There are antiques in the apartment, such as furniture and paintings. In the living room there is no longer the Steinbeck piano that can be seen in the photos. The apartment has a spacious living room, kitchen, two bathrooms, a double bedroom and a study with desk and two single beds.
neighborhood_overview: In front of the palace, on the square, centuries-old trees shade the traditional stalls of the food market where once, in medieval times, there was the moat that surrounded the settlement of the first millennium (Circhia dei Mille). Traces of the fortified walls are still within walking distance: a medieval gate (Torresotto) is still there, leaning against our building and leading to the road to Piazza di Porta Ravegnana. You'll then find every food item, restaurant and bar underneath your home.
host_about: Paolo Devescovi, Italian, tourist rental experience since 2003, architect free lance and art teacher in public school. I am an architect and surely I can take care of buildings better than care of money. Since then, the rental activity, held through the web, became an important activity of mine. As freelance architect I soon acquired clients who expressly wanted to restore or to refurbish their houses for doing the same rental activity I was managing for my own properties. The whole has been dressed by my enthusiastic approach to the possibilities offered by the Internet. I aggregated around my private website a small community of guests. In some cases, true friendships started for long lasting rapports.  Some years ago, I ought to vary my little beloved activity (I was used to call it ‘my window facing the world’) when some companies bought the whole trust of the online advertisements, begining to target the fast online-booking-style through the search engines rather than to foster the quality of growing sincere relationships as I was used to offer through my website and my personal brand Archirent (do a search on line for more). Anyway I  went to great lengths to maintain the original spirit fighting against standardization of great commercial websites. Right now I can count to the cooperation of my valid colleague and architect Carlotta Lo Verde. During the booking process and also during your stay, for any circumstance, you will deal directly with us.

name: Apartment in the center of Bologna
description: Apartment nestled in a historical and fashionable context. A bohemian atmosphere will welcome you at any time of year, changing the apartment's accessories. Complete with every comfort: from bed linen to towels, dishes, appliances. A kitchen with a double sofa bed and a large bedroom, furnished with a double bed and a single bed. Convenient for groups of friends, families or work colleagues.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in one of the most characteristic streets of Bologna: via del Pratello.
 
The London Sunday Times has framed Bologna as a hipster city in Italy. Seeing in the area of the Pratello an equivalent of the London district of Shoreditch.
It is a street full of varied premises: from the tavern, to the pub, to the sought-after restaurant.
During the day you can breathe the air of culture and in the evening lots of young and old people, populate the street sipping a cocktail or a beer.
host_about:
Ciao mi chiamo Emilia e sono una persona estroversa e comunicativa. 
Chiacchierare con le persone, conoscere e confrontarmi con realtà uguali e diverse dalle mie mi rende libera! Vi aspetto nella mia casa di via del Pratello!

Hello, my name is Emilia and I am an outgoing and communicative person.
Chatting with people, getting to know and confronting realities that are the same and different from mine makes me free! 
I wait for you in my home in via del Pratello!

name: Mari house (5 pax,  80 square metres)
description:
My house is newly refurbished and central (ZTL area). It is located at the second and last floor of an ancient building, only 10 minutes walk from train station, Piazza Maggiore, the 2 Towers and the old food Market.
Around the corner is a big Pam supermarket, open 7 days a week 'til 10.30 pm, ice cream shops, old food market "Mercato delle Erbe", public park ("Parco 11 Settembre 2001" usw.
neighborhood_overview:
The area surrounding my house is typical bolognese, with portici (no need an umbrella in case of rain!) and plenty of old workshops, food markets (Mercato delle Erbe), ice cream shops, bakeries, public parks, osterie, coffe bar and restaurants.. A big supermarket, open until 12 p.m., is just around the corner.
You don't need the car for visiting Bologna. You just have to walk through the ancient streets of Bologna and discover towers, canals, squares, museums and monuments.

name: Le Porte,  Luxury and bright with private terrace.
description:
Bright three-room apartment of 66 sqm with access from the apartment's private terrace.
The living area features a living room with sofa bed, and a dining table for four guests. The modern kitchen is fully equipped. The first windowed bathroom has a hot tub (with Whirlpool water jet massage) and a washer/dryer. The second windowed bathroom features a large shower. The sleeping area: It consists of two bedrooms one with double bed and one with two single beds.
neighborhood_overview: We are in the exact center of the old medieval city. Between the main square, Piazza Maggiore, and the symbolic two towers, Garisenda and Asinelli. Piazza Maggiore is the main square of Bologna and it is surrounded by the most important buildings: Palazzo Podesta, which dates back to 1200, Palazzo Re Enzo, Palazzo d'Accursio, a monumental architectural complex of the fourteenth century, now the seat of the Municipality of Bologna. The last side of the square is enhanced by the Basilica of San Petronio, an example of Italian Gothic, which began on the end of the 14th century and never completed. Palazzo Banchi marks the beginning of the most famous porch of the city, the Pavaglione, connecting Piazza Maggiore at the Archiginnasio, the first seat of the University of Bologna, the oldest in the world. Today the seat of the University is located less than 5 minutes walk from the apartment, in Via Zamboni, half of which there is the Teatro Comunale.

host_about:
Wow. Davvero molto difficile scrivere di me. Mi piace incontrare persone in viaggio e condividere l'esperienza dell'incontro.
Da universitario ero iscritto ad Hospitality Club, il sito per viaggiare ed ospitare gratuitamente persone, ma poi ho dovuto smettere. Ora che ho nuovamente la libertà di ospitare persone in casa, ho pensato che Airbnb fosse fosse il giusto equilibrio tra l'affitto da pagare e il piacere di ospitare i viaggiatori.

Curo l'amministrazione di una compagnia teatrale, gestisco una piccola società che organizza eventi di piazza e servizi bici, mentre con un'altra associazione di cui sono fondatore facciamo la mitica asta di biciclette a basso costo e curo progetti sociali per la città -  E' un lavoro strano, senza orari, che mi porta ad essere spesso fuori casa e sempre a contatto con le persone. Però, escluso il fatto che mi tiene inchiodato a Bologna, mi piace.
Il mondo è troppo grande per essere visitato tutto, allora ospitare i viaggiatori diventa per me un modo per conosce un pezzo di mondo senza esserci stato.

Cosa mi piace?
mille cose, ne cito qualcuna
cucinare, sia la cucina tradizionale ma anche la sperimentazione;
andare in bici - è comodo, divertente e rilassante. Poi Bologna in bici è molto facile;
i giochi - ping pong, biliardino, calcio. Qualsiasi gioco che faccia divertire;
d'inverno mi piace organizzare cene in casa con gli amici, guardare un bel film oppure giocare (carte, risiko, ecc.).

Non mi piace andare alle feste, forse perché spesso ne sono l'organizzatore, allora non riesco a rilassarmi e divertirmi fino in fondo.

neighborhood_overview: The San Donato district is located in the area immediately outside the walls of Bologna, is a neighborhood built for the most part in the 70s and is located in an ideal position to reach the Sant'Orsola Hospital, the Bologna Fair and the Villa Erbosa Hospital. host_about: Sono un'imprenditrice bolognese, che da anni sul territorio di Bologna si dedica ad un'attività legata al Business&Holiday rentals (gestione di case vacanze e affitti brevi), che adoro.  Con "Bologna Accommodation" ho esaudito il desiderio di ospitare e permettere ai miei ospiti di conoscere la mia città, mostrandone i segreti, le specialità e le sfaccettature che pochi bolognesi veramente conoscono. Per me e il mio team è un'immensa soddisfazione far sentire gli ospiti a casa e far scoprir loro la Bologna autentica che solo i veri local sono in grado di mettere in mostra.

name: SAN CARLO HOLIDAY HOUSE ,  BOLOGNA CENTRO
description:
Elegant apartment in historic building in the center of Bologna, with 1 bedroom with double bed (160•200), 1 living room with double sofa bed (140•200), 1 mezzanine with French double bed (140•200) , 1 small kitchen with induction, fridge and dishwasher, 1 bathroom with shower and hairdryer
Ground floor with independent access from the condominium loggia and overlooking it.
The painter Carracci lived here. You can breathe some Bolognese history. A10’ from Central Station.
neighborhood_overview: You will be  in the heart of Bologna, in a historic building, 400 metres from Via  dell 'Indipendenza and 900 metres from Piazza Maggiore (where you will find the Basilica of San Petronio and the departure of the open tourist buses and the train that reaches the Sanctuary of San Luca) and from the so-called Quadrilatero , shopping centre, typical Bolognese restaurants and main points of historical and cultural interest.  At 500 metres you will find the Mambo museum in Via Don Minzoni , at 800 metres the Mercato delle Erbe in Via Ugo Bassi, at 900 metres the Due Torri (Garisenda and Asinelli) continuing for 200 metres Piazza Verdi , the Teatro Comunale and the university area.
host_about:
Bolognesi da sempre , adoriamo Bologna e tutto quello che offre, dalla cultura al cibo, dai particolari antichi ( Bologna fu prima Bononia dal 139 a.c. ) ai negozi di shopping, dagli storici e unici portici al mondo ai “vecchi” posticini dove spizzicare qualcosa di tipico bolognese accompagnato da un calice di vino.
Se siete interessati chiedetecelo , vi daremo la mappa con le cose principali da visitare e  qualche indicazione sui locali più caratteristici dove poter degustare il vero sapore di Bologna. 
E ricordate che i tortellini si mangiano “in brodo” e le tagliatelle sono “al ragù “...

The apartment is located in a semi-central area but surrounded by greenery. Near the Dall 'Ara stadium, at the foot of the hill of the Basilica of San Luca (reachable with a walk along the porticoes, unforgettable) In a few minutes by public transport you can reach the center of Bologna, or for those who love walking, in about halfan hour you can experience a picturesque walk along the porticoes of Via Saragozza with arrival in Piazza Maggiore. Just as many minutes to get to the train station on foot (with public transport - direct bus no. 21 it takes about 20 minutes; while for the airport it is advisable to use public transport taking about twenty minutes). From this area you can easily reach the Unipol Arena and also the Golf Club Bologna. At 100 metres, the Carrefour market is open 24 hours a day, but the area offers a variety of traditional restaurants and trattorias.

neighborhood_overview:
Close to the University of Bologna, the famous Two Towers and the Quadrilatero, this flat is located in a trendy and buzzing area, with coffee shops independent, fashion boutiques and typical bolognese restaurants.
The flat is adjacent to the splendid Santo Stefano Square, the famous Seven Churches and the magnificent Santa Maria dei Servi Abbey.
The nearest paid parking which costs only 20 euros per day is 15 minutes walk in Piazza 8 Agosto, open 24/7

We really love the city and would love to tell you where to go, places to eat, where to walk, etc. so please feel free to ask for any advice you may need.

The main tourist attractions such as Piazza Maggiore and the Two Towers, Piazza Santo Stefano, the Archiginnasio, the MamBO, the Archological Museum, the Morandi Museum and the Basilica of San Petronio are just a few meters away. Wide variety of restaurants, trattorias and pizzerias within walking distance.

name: V. Ranocchi 3F, the Quadrilatero ancient tradition
description:
Just 50 metres from Piazza Maggiore, the flat is located within the pedestrian area known as the Quadrilatero, the city's medieval marketplace.
With an area of 85 square meters, it has three large bedrooms, well lit and equipped with air conditioning, two bathrooms, a small kitchen and a studio.
neighborhood_overview:
The “Quadrilatero” is a perfect starting point to visit the centre of Bologna.
The main turistic attractions, such as Piazza Maggiore (with the Basilica of St. Petronio and Palazzo d’Accursio), St. Peter Cathedral, the Two Towers, Piazza della Mercanzia, Piazza S. Stefano are less than 300 meters from your accommodation.
In the same area you will find the main shopping districts (Galleria Cavour and Via D’Azeglio), a lot of restaurants and the most attended bars.

name: Two Bedrooms Apartment | 4 Star Family & Friends
description:
The apartment is composed of two double bedrooms with king size double bed, two bathrooms, a spacious living room with double sofa bed, dining room and fully equipped kitchen.

It's perfect to spend a holiday with your friends or family, a stone throw to the historical centre, Bologna train station and the fair district!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very strategical position in Bologna!

5 minutes walking from the central train station, 200m far from via Indipendenza, the main street of the city centre famous for its shops, 10 minutes far from the Two Towers and very close to the fair district.
host_about:
Ciao a tutti, sono Pippo! 

Insieme al mio staff di 4 Star Bologna ci occupiamo della gestione di attività extra-alberghiere e strutture ricettive.
 
Ad oggi siamo presenti con più di 10 strutture sul territorio bolognese, tutte differenti fra loro poichè pensate per ogni specifica esigenza dei nostri ospiti. Abbiamo proposte specifiche adatte a:  coppie, lavoratori, famiglie e gruppi di amici.

Se state cercando un luogo dove trascorrere qualche giorno sentendovi come a casa, i nostri appartamenti e le nostre camere sono perfetti per voi!

Da anni ormai il principale obbiettivo di 4 Star è quello di rendere il soggiorno di ognuno dei nostri ospiti unico e speciale riservando loro tutte le attenzioni che ci si aspetterebbe di trovare in un hotel, ma nella comodità e autonomia che offre una casa vacanza.

Tutto questo è possibile grazie al nostro staff, un team altamente qualificato e compatto che sarà a vostra disposizione dal momento della prenotazione alla vostra partenza, sempre pronto ad esaudire ogni richiesta e ad aiutarvi in caso di qualsiasi necessità.

Vi aspettiamo a Bologna, non vediamo l'ora di accogliervi per farvi scoprire la nostra splendida città!

neighborhood_overview: It is only 1.4 km from the Sant'Orsola-Malpighi Hospital and only 2.1 km from the Fiera di Bologna. host_about:
Mi chiamo Barbara, vivo a Bologna con mio marito Aldo e i miei figli da molti anni. Mi sono innamorata di questa bellissima città grazie a mio marito. Le mie passioni sono la danza classica, il cibo emiliano, i vini italiani e viaggiare in motocicletta.
Mi piace spostarmi in libertà scegliendo strutture essenziali e confortevoli che mi facciano sentire a casa.

Downtown Bologna Apartment is located in the heart of the historic center of Bologna, in a quiet street a few steps from the main attractions of the city.

It consists of 3 bedrooms for a total of 9 people. Every room has air conditioning.

There are 3 bathrooms, 2 with shower and 1 with bathtub.

The kitchen is fully equipped with pots, dishes, cutlery, coffee maker, kettle, dishwasher, refrigerator, oven and microwave.
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the heart of the center of Bologna, in the heart of the city. Although downtown our apartment is on a quiet street without traffic.

Many bars, taverns, restaurants and shops are located a short walk from the apartment. Coop supermarket is 30 meters away.

Piazza Maggiore, the Two Towers and Via Indipendenza are less than a 3-minute walk away.

The apartment lends itself perfectly as a starting point for the Via degli Dei, being in the center 100 meters from Piazza Maggiore.

name: Amazing terrace with SPA Bath, cozy 2 bedrooms apt
description:
It is an apartment located a few meters far from the train station and the city center.

Spacious and bright, equipped with all the comforts the apartment is composed of an entrance facing a spacious living room, kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. To make your stay perfect a wonderful terrace with a little living space and a Spa bath.

Perfect to spend a holiday with friends or family with a little Relax!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a very strategical position in Bologna!

5 minutes walking from the central train station, 200m far from via Indipendenza, the main street of the city centre famous for its shops, 10 minutes far from the Two Towers and very close to the fair district.
host_about:
Ciao a tutti, sono Pippo! 

Insieme al mio staff di 4 Star Bologna ci occupiamo della gestione di attività extra-alberghiere e strutture ricettive.
 
Ad oggi siamo presenti con più di 10 strutture sul territorio bolognese, tutte differenti fra loro poichè pensate per ogni specifica esigenza dei nostri ospiti. Abbiamo proposte specifiche adatte a:  coppie, lavoratori, famiglie e gruppi di amici.

Se state cercando un luogo dove trascorrere qualche giorno sentendovi come a casa, i nostri appartamenti e le nostre camere sono perfetti per voi!

Da anni ormai il principale obbiettivo di 4 Star è quello di rendere il soggiorno di ognuno dei nostri ospiti unico e speciale riservando loro tutte le attenzioni che ci si aspetterebbe di trovare in un hotel, ma nella comodità e autonomia che offre una casa vacanza.

Tutto questo è possibile grazie al nostro staff, un team altamente qualificato e compatto che sarà a vostra disposizione dal momento della prenotazione alla vostra partenza, sempre pronto ad esaudire ogni richiesta e ad aiutarvi in caso di qualsiasi necessità.

Vi aspettiamo a Bologna, non vediamo l'ora di accogliervi per farvi scoprire la nostra splendida città!

name: Charming flat Milazzo 32 Bologna
description: The flat, perfect for a holiday with your whole family or friends, is a few steps from the central station and the bus station in Piazza XX Settembre, but if you come by car you can park in the nearby Central Station Garage.
neighborhood_overview:
The main city spots can be visited just walking: the high streets (Via Indipendenza, Via Rizzoli, Galleria Cavour),the most evocative artistic places (The Two Towers, Neptune Fountain and Maggiore Square with the San Petronio church), the main cultural attractions (the Teatro Comunale, Sala Borsa, the MAMBO museum, the archeological and medieval museum), the historical places (the Mercato di Mezzo, Mercato delle Erbe, Piazza Santo Stefano with the seven churches), the historical buildings (Pepoli, d’Accursio, of the Podesta’, King Enzo, of Notai, of Mercanzia and of Fava). Also renowned restaurants, bistrots and “osterie” are few minutes walk from the flat.

I also suggest to consider visiting the Azzo Giardini place, with the historical Lumiere Cinema, with daily projections of movies in original language.

neighborhood_overview:
Your apartment is very close to all the main points of interests of the city:
Piazza Maggiore (main square), Fontana del Nettuno (historical fountain), San Petronio church and the famous Two Towers are less than a 5-minute walk.
Bologna’s city center can be easily visited on foot and, even if it’s raining, the covered walkways (portici) extend throughout most of the city’s streets and will prevent your visit to be interrupted by weather conditions.
Aside from their utility for visiting the city, public means of transport like buses and trains (the train station is only a 15-minute walk from the building) make our location a strategic point for exploring every attraction of the region as well, from gastronomical tours to Ducati, Ferrari and Lamborghini museums and to visit Maserati and Ducati’s factories.
The Teatro Comunale di Bologna, the Manzoni theatre and the main shopping and fashion streets are just within walking distance.

name: Qui sentirai il battito pulsante di Bologna
description:
The Ottavo Portone is in the center of Bologna, in a university area, full of clubs, pubs, restaurants, art galleries, museums... the most lively and lively neighborhood in the city.
However, the apartment is on a secondary street, quiet and quiet, where you can rest serenely and in a few minutes on foot you can reach the beating and cultural heart of Bologna.
The rooms, spacious, are decorated by hand, with passion and accuracy.
neighborhood_overview:
The Eighth Gate is in an area full of artistic, cultural and culinary attractions, as well as green areas such as parks and gardens. But not only that! From the Eighth Gate you can reach in just 5 minutes the Villa Torri clinic and the Policlinico S.Orsola (a national excellence) in a quarter of an hour.
It is advisable, given the proximity, to walk to museums, squares, palaces and monuments. Walking along the streets of the city center will allow you to discover characteristic corners of Bologna, stop to taste typical Emilian dishes. You will arrive in 10 minutes in Piazza Maggiore, where you can visit the Basilica of San Petronio, admire the Neptune Fountain and Palazzo d 'Accursio, passing under the Two Towers. If you want to rest, maybe after being at the busy Montagnola market, you can climb the Pincio staircase and sit in the shade of the plantains.
host_about:
Amo viaggiare leggera e con passi leggeri cerco di muovermi su questa terra.
Mi piace osservare il mondo e la sua gente, visitando città affollate o perdendomi in luoghi dimenticati.
Adoro piante e animali e tutto quello che desta in me meraviglia.
Preferisco la montagna al mare.
Arrampico, quando posso...
Ho due grandi passioni, che in fondo si assomigliano: l'arte e l'orto...

I love travelling light and with light steps I try to move round on this earth. I like observing the world and its people, visiting crowded cities or losing myself within
forgotten sites. I adore plants and animals and everything which leaves me in awe. I prefer mountains to the sea. I climb, when I can… I have two great passions, which are ultimately similar: Art and my garden…

name: Realkasa City Center Flat
description:
Cozy apartment, completely renovated in February 2020, with 2 bedrooms in the historic center equipped with all comforts on the 1st floor with elevator.

This apartment is accessed via SELF CHECK-IN. It is therefore necessary to fill out the form that you will receive by email to obtain the directions and access codes.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a strategic area of ​​the historic center. Leaving the house you can immerse yourself in the numerous points of historical and artistic interest such as The Seven Churches in Piazza Santo Stefano, the characteristic Jewish Ghetto, the Archiginnasio which was the seat of the historic university of Bologna, the municipal theater, Piazza Grande with the Basilica of San Petronio in addition to the central via Indipendenza. A tour of the food and wine boutiques and taverns located throughout the center is also highly recommended, especially in the Quadrilatero.
In the immediate vicinity are also the XI Settembre and Cavaticcio parks, where the biological market of the earth takes place on Saturdays and during the summer a rich calendar of gastronomic and musical events is scheduled.

Your apartment is very close to all the main points of interests of the city:
Piazza Maggiore (main square), Fontana del Nettuno (historical fountain), San Petronio church and the famous Two Towers are less than a 5-minute walk.
Bologna’s city center can be easily visited on foot and, even if it’s raining, the covered walkways (portici) extend throughout most of the city’s streets and will prevent your visit to be interrupted by weather conditions.
Aside from their utility for visiting the city, public means of transport like buses and trains (the train station is only a 15-minute walk from the building) make our location a strategic point for exploring every attraction of the region as well, from gastronomical tours to Ducati, Ferrari and Lamborghini museums and to visit Maserati and Ducati’s factories.
The Teatro Comunale di Bologna, the Manzoni theatre and the main shopping and fashion streets are just within walking distance.

name: FamilyBO Apartments Santo Stefano
description:
Located in the heart of the city in a wonderful historic building from the 1800s, just 100 meters from the evocative Piazza Santo Stefano and 200 meters from the Asinelli Towers and Garisenda, FamilyBO Apartments Santo Stefano is the ideal apartment to experience Bologna with your family.
Comfortable and spacious, with exposed beams, furnished in modern style, consists of a large living room with sofa bed, spacious kitchen, two double bedrooms, a bathroom with shower and one with bathtub.

host_about:
Debora è il mio nome di battesimo ma il
mio nome all'anagrafe è Lidia. 
Da quando sono bambina mi chiamano tutti Debora , però se non vi piace potete sempre chiamarmi Lidia !
Amo gli animali , soprattutto i cani , infatti ne ho adottati quattro!
Lavoro nella moda, impazzisco per i mercatini vintage!
Amo la musica ,la danza classica e contemporanea!
Mi piace la buona cucina accompagnata da un buon vino!

name: Zamboni 12 - Classic Apartment
description:
Spacious and renovated apartment in the heart of the historic center of the city, very close to the Jewish Ghetto and the University Area.
It has two bedrooms and one sofa bed.
It's on the first floor, no elevator.
host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: Peace or fun of your choice
description: The terrace is very quiet and comfortable to make beautiful BBQ with friends or candlelight dinners (there is also electric light, however, on the terrace); the apartment has two large bedrooms with a double bed and a single and two singles in the other; there is a study with desk and fast Internet connection; there is a covered glass veranda where the washing machine and service furniture are;
neighborhood_overview: the neighborhood is very close to the city center and 50 meters from the main door there is the best Bolognese restaurant in the city (to be booked in advance because it is also very cheap) as well as many other ethnic and non-ethnic pubs and restaurants. host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: UR-NEST Moline
description: Lovely three bedroom two bathroom apartment with terrace, fully renovated in February 2015 and fitted with parquet and air conditioning. Located on the 3rd floor of a residential building (with elevator) in the very heart of Bologna, it overlooks the internal courtyard of the buidling, thus offering a very quiet environment.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment has a great location within walking distance from the center of Bologna, just 850 meters from Piazza Maggiore, Palazzo di Re Enzo and Piazza del Nettuno, and about 650 meters from the world-renowned medieval towers Garisenda and Asinelli.



A few minutes’ walk allows you to reach the famous University of Bologna, located in Via Zamboni (650 meters), the Botanical Gardens (700 meters) and the Museum of Palazzo Poggi (500 meters).



Less than 10 minutes away is also the Museo Civico Medievale (Civic Museum of the Middle Ages), housed since 1985 at Palazzo Ghisilardi, one of the best examples of Renaissance architecture in Bologna.

Located in the building next to the university, which is also home to the Academy of Fine Arts, the National Art Gallery of Bologna offers paintings and works of arts from churches and monasteries around the city.



Bologna’s main shopping streets - Corte Isolani and the ‘Go
