name: Alto Gallery Home ti accoglie a Bologna Cirenaica
description: Alfredo's paintings, in art at_to, gave birth to Alto Gallery Home: 3 double bedrooms with a bathroom, without a kitchen. Bright rooms, a few steps from the center, the S. Orsola Hospital and comfortable for the Fair. The particular decor of the showers inspired the names: Ficus, Garden, and Palm Tree. We rent rooms individually, max 2 people per room (beds not divisible). In the Palm there is a third bed. In Ficus and Garden there is the terrace. Convenient parking.
neighborhood_overview:
Walking through the streets of the Cyrenaica neighborhood, you can breathe the most genuine Bolognese air: the osteria "Da Vito" is one of the oldest, famous for having hosted illustrious biassanots – those who stayed all night for taverns – such as Lucio Dalla, Francesco Guccini (who lived a stone's throw from here, in Via Paolo Fabbri). You can also find a fruit and vegetable market in the immediate vicinity, as well as regional specialties, restaurants, pizzerias and bars also for celiacs and vegetarians, and a supermarket.
Continuing from Via Massarenti towards Via San Vitale, full of shops and restaurants, you can reach the center, under the 2 Towers, the symbol par excellence of Bologna.
host_about: Mi chiamo Paola e insieme a mio marito Alfredo abbiamo aperto questa attività nel 2021. Mi occupo di servizi di traduzione e organizzazione congressi, mentre Alfredo è un ingegnere con la passione della pittura. Ci piace incontrare nuove persone e, quando non possiamo viaggiare, il mondo viene da noi! Questo ci entusiasma: possiamo raccontare ai nostri ospiti cosa offre Bologna e scoprire le bellezze della loro città.

name: La maison de   Balleon con parcheggio gratuito.
description: In a quiet and peaceful environment, this particular apartment is born, completely renovated and furnished in an industrial style with some traditional elements. The guest immerses themselves in an enchanted and relaxing atmosphere... nothing is left to chance...theeye is captured by a planner, a tribute to our mother's land.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the Porto district that owes its name to the Via del Puerto, an ancient access point to Porto Naviglio, the Bolognese staircase for river traffic in transit on the Navile Canal, an important commercial hub since the mid 1500.
Neighborhood guide to this second guesswork.

Porto-Saragoza Neighborhood: Art and Culture

Many are the historical artifacts brought to light in the Porto-Saragozza neighborhood, from the Etruscan Necropolises found along Via Andrea Costa and at the Certosa, to the villa's voices found in Villa Casarini (now home to the engineering school), until you reach the discovery of Roman spas near Palazzo Albergati on Via Saragozza.

It would be impossible for us to list all the places, events, works and architecture that make this neighborhood one of the most interesting from a historical and artistic point of view in the whole city. For this reason, we will only tell you about the most iconic places in the n

name: S. Vitale 3 bedroom Apartment
description: Beautiful and modern three-bedroom and three-bathroom apartment, about 120 sqm, on the mezzanine floor of an elegant building (without elevator, 8 steps) overlooking one of the most picturesque, porticoed-street in the city centre, a few steps away from the famous medieval tower Asinelli; a perfect location for guests to explore the heart of the historic centre.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located squarely in the center of the old medieval town. Via San Vitale is a picturesque, porticoed-street that leads to the Tower of Asinelli (which can be seen from the entrance of the apartment)  and then to Piazza Maggiore, Bologna’s main square, which is surrounded by the city’s most important buildings. Palazzo Podestà is the oldest of them; it dates back to the year 1200 and is flanked by the Arengo Tower, whose tolling was once the call for Bologna’s residents to gather to the square. The nearby Palazzo Re Enzo is famous for its pedestrian crossroads, topped by a cross vault with special acoustic properties. Palazzo d’Accursio is a fourteenth-century architectural complex now serving as Bologna’s administrative seat. Palazzo Banchi marks the entrance to the city’s most famous portico, the Pavaglione, connecting Piazza Maggiore to the Archiginnasio, the first seat of the University of Bologna, the oldest in the world. description: Casa del Professore is the ideal place to stay a couple of steps from the Two Towers and Piazza Maggiore, it is located in the heart of the "learned" Bologna. host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: San Donato Fiera Bologna Green House x6
description:
Apartment located on the first floor of a building with a lift.
In 75 square meters of space, it comfortably accommodates 6 people with two double bedrooms and a sofa bed in the living room.

Connected with the city center and with all points of interest in Bologna.
It is conveniently located to reach the Fiera area and the historic center and a few minutes by bus to reach the Bologna Centrale railway station.
neighborhood_overview:
Bologna is a city where you can easily move on foot; where you eat great; and above all full of cultural attractions.
It is also a young and full of life city: along the streets and in the wide squares you can see many students.
The city enjoys great fame in the cultural field, as the seat of the prestigious Alma Mater Studiorum, or the University of Bologna, considered among the best in the beautiful country and among the oldest in the world: the foundation date dates from the year 1088 .
Bologna is wonderful to visit thanks to the numerous historical and cultural testimonies. The center, surrounded by ancient arcades, boasts fascinating monuments and prestigious buildings that blend well with the elegance of this particular city.

name: 6 single beds in Santa Viola

Spacious, bright and quiet apartment on the second floor, equipped with an elevator.
The apartment, renovated and with new furnishings, consists of three large bedrooms, each equipped with two single beds and a desk, an open kitchen in the dining room, bathroom, two balconies.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the historic Santa Viola neighborhood, located between the Porta San Felice (access to the city center) and the bridge (Pontelungo) on the Reno River. The apartment is near Pontelungo, on a quiet and untrafficked street.

Within a distance of the apartment of 200-300 meters there are restaurants, pizzerias, bars, ice cream parlors, grocery and clothing stores, banks, pharmacy, an Aldi supermarket.
There is an Esselunga supermarket 15 minutes walk (downtown).

In the neighborhood there is the "MAST Manifattura di Arti, Experimentation and Technology", a large multipurpose center that houses several collections, permanent and temporary. The MAST (Via Speranza # 42) is a 10-minute walk from the apartment.

description: Large and elegant apartment of about 150 sqm, consisting of 3 bedrooms, living room with open kitchen, 2 bathrooms and laundry room. neighborhood_overview: It is an area that gravitates around Piazza Maggiore (Church of San Petronio, one of Italy’s most important churches, Palazzo d'Accursio, Museo Morandi, the municipal art collections, Palazzo Re Enzo, and the Civic Museum), the imposing Piazza Nettuno with the beautiful fountain by Giambologna, the former Sala Borsa, home to a large multimedia library, and the Two Towers, dating back to the twelve century. In the vicinity, you can find a cluster of intertwined narrow streets featuring spice markets, pubs, trendy clubs, as well as typical and historical food stores. A convenient supermarket is located a few steps from the property and you only have to walk a few steps to reach some of Bologna’s most famous restaurants.

name: Cozy Apartment Family 'n' Friends 4starbologna
description:
Spacious and comfortable apartment with 3 Double Bedrooms, living room with double sofa bed and large dining area, 2 bathrooms, one with bathtub and one with shower, fully equipped kitchen, and two terraces.

The ideal solution for a vacation with family or friends within walking distance of the central station and the historic center of Bologna!
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a strategic area of Bologna!

5 minutes' walk from the central train station, 200 meters from Via Indipendenza, the main promenade and shopping street, 10 minutes' walk from the Two Towers, and close to the Fairgrounds.
host_about:
Ciao a tutti, sono Pippo! 

Insieme al mio staff di 4 Star Bologna ci occupiamo della gestione di attività extra-alberghiere e strutture ricettive.
 
Ad oggi siamo presenti con più di 10 strutture sul territorio bolognese, tutte differenti fra loro poichè pensate per ogni specifica esigenza dei nostri ospiti. Abbiamo proposte specifiche adatte a:  coppie, lavoratori, famiglie e gruppi di amici.

Se state cercando un luogo dove trascorrere qualche giorno sentendovi come a casa, i nostri appartamenti e le nostre camere sono perfetti per voi!

Da anni ormai il principale obbiettivo di 4 Star è quello di rendere il soggiorno di ognuno dei nostri ospiti unico e speciale riservando loro tutte le attenzioni che ci si aspetterebbe di trovare in un hotel, ma nella comodità e autonomia che offre una casa vacanza.

Tutto questo è possibile grazie al nostro staff, un team altamente qualificato e compatto che sarà a vostra disposizione dal momento della prenotazione alla vostra partenza, sempre pronto ad esaudire ogni richiesta e ad aiutarvi in caso di qualsiasi necessità.

Vi aspettiamo a Bologna, non vediamo l'ora di accogliervi per farvi scoprire la nostra splendida città!

3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 living room, 1 dining room, 1 kitchenette and 2 terraces

Il Pratello is an area of the historic center of Bologna, it takes its name and branches off around Via del Pratello, an ancient arcaded road of about 600 meters.

A lively popular neighborhood, it is well known for its intense nightlife. In this area, in addition to numerous bars and taverns, there are also some craft shops, vintage clothing, food, various design activities, furniture, publishing, graphics, a barber, a web TV, a web radio, Europa Cinema and some theater companies.

name: Twiggy - spacious and bright, comfort and design
description: A casa di Twiggy is a large and bright apartment that has been totally renovated with current materials and comforts but which, consistent with the period of construction of the building, retains a mid-century atmosphere, thanks to some modern decorations and furnishings, researched and personally restored by me. Everything is designed to welcome you with care and to enjoy the city, including my welcome book with info on service nearby, transport, restaurants, tourist attractions, etc.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Porta San Donato, in a quiet and peaceful street, adjacent to the Sant'Orsola hospital and the university area, convenient for  the station and the exibition. The Two Towers are exactly 1 km away.  Nearby there are restaurants, bars, services and many shops.
host_about:
Ciao, sono Federica, marchigiana di origine e bolognese di adozione, amante dei viaggi, della lettura, del ballo, dei miei figli e di tutte quelle persone, cose e luoghi che hanno una storia da raccontare. Anche per questo amo dedicarmi al restauro ed al recupero creativo e, quando ho tempo, mi piace imparare qualche nuova piccola arte creativa. Apprezzo il buon cibo e mi piace cucinare e provare i piatti tipici delle diverse parti del mondo. Sono sempre curiosa di visitare posti diversi e di imparare qualcosa di nuovo.
Qualche anno fa io e mio marito abbiamo iniziato ad ospitare nella casa familiare e la soddisfazione nel farlo mi ha spinta, nel tempo, a cambiare completamente vita lavorativa ed a dedicarmi a tempo pieno all’accoglienza turistica. Le case in cui vi ospito parlano di me perché le ho pensate, arredate ed allestite in prima persona, secondo uno stile diverso in ognuna ma dove molti oggetti hanno un passato ed una storia da raccontare.

name: Affittacamere sociale sui colli bolognesi
description: We look forward to seeing you in our corner of heaven, in the Bolognese hills near the wonderful Hermitage of Ronzano, a few kilometers from the center of Bologna!
host_about:
La Cooperativa Sociale DoMani realizza progetti di accoglienza e integrazione sociale per richiedenti asilo e attività di inserimento lavorativo per fasce deboli. 
DoMani, specializzata nel settore dell’immigrazione, accoglie incondizionatamente persone fragili e genera impatto sociale nel territorio di appartenenza. Di fatto, in stretta collaborazione con l’Ordine dei Servi di Maria, 
gestisce gli spazi dell’Eremo di Ronzano, dedicandoli a: 
- Quattro comunità di accoglienza per rifugiati politici (Comunità per minori, neo maggiorenni, famiglie e adulti fragili)
- Affittacamere sociale co-gestito con i rifugiati politici residenti 
- Attività di agricoltura sociale finalizzata all’inserimento di fasce deboli
- Laboratori ed eventi sociali destinati a scuole e comunità locale

______________
Debre Mariam is a  Social Guest House located within the famous Church of Ronzano. The peculiarity of Debre Mariam is that it belongs to the Social Cooperative DoMani, which focuses on social inclusion and job integration projects for marginalised people. 
The Social Guest House is co-managed by and gives home to political refugees, which are guaranteed job stability and financial independence via any income resulting from the business.

name: Affittacamere sociale sui colli bolognesi
description: We look forward to seeing you in our corner of heaven, in the Bolognese hills near the wonderful Hermitage of Ronzano, a few kilometers from the center of Bologna!
host_about:
La Cooperativa Sociale DoMani realizza progetti di accoglienza e integrazione sociale per richiedenti asilo e attività di inserimento lavorativo per fasce deboli. 
DoMani, specializzata nel settore dell’immigrazione, accoglie incondizionatamente persone fragili e genera impatto sociale nel territorio di appartenenza. Di fatto, in stretta collaborazione con l’Ordine dei Servi di Maria, 
gestisce gli spazi dell’Eremo di Ronzano, dedicandoli a: 
- Quattro comunità di accoglienza per rifugiati politici (Comunità per minori, neo maggiorenni, famiglie e adulti fragili)
- Affittacamere sociale co-gestito con i rifugiati politici residenti 
- Attività di agricoltura sociale finalizzata all’inserimento di fasce deboli
- Laboratori ed eventi sociali destinati a scuole e comunità locale

______________
Debre Mariam is a  Social Guest House located within the famous Church of Ronzano. The peculiarity of Debre Mariam is that it belongs to the Social Cooperative DoMani, which focuses on social inclusion and job integration projects for marginalised people. 
The Social Guest House is co-managed by and gives home to political refugees, which are guaranteed job stability and financial independence via any income resulting from the business.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Bologna! Located in the heart of Italy, Bologna is a city rich in history, culture and culinary delights. Known as the "Dotta" for its ancient university, the "Grassa" for its delicious cuisine and the "Red" for its characteristic red brick buildings, Bologna is a must-see destination for travelers.

During your stay in Bologna, you will have the opportunity to visit many places of interest. A short distance from your accommodation, you can admire the Church of the Holy Salvatore, an architectural jewel that dates back to the 12th century. Its Romanesque facade and charming interior will leave you speechless.

If you are a nature lover, you can't miss the Gardens of Villa Cassarini. This quiet park offers a relaxing break from the hustle and bustle of the city, with its centuries-old trees and romantic trails. It's the perfect place for a walk or picnic.

Also not to be missed is Palazzo Pallavicini, a sumptuous Renaissance palace located in the

name: San Donato Fiera Apartment
description:
Perfectly connected with the city center and all the points of interest of Bologna, our apartment is the best solution for both business trips and for those looking for a starting point for discovering the wonders of Bologna and the province.

It is located in a convenient position to reach the Fiera area and the historic center of Bologna and a few minutes by bus to reach the Bologna Centrale railway station.
neighborhood_overview:
From the apartment, no more than 5 minutes on foot, there are:
- Bus stop
- Pharmacy open every day from 08:00 to 24:00
- Supermarket also open on Sunday mornings
- News kiosk
- Tobacconist's shop complete with night time self-service
- Flower shop
- Multi-manager telephone shop
- Small shop with all kinds of products open at all hours
- Hairdresser
- Tire specialist
- Butcher's shop
- Wine shop
- Trattoria
- Bruschetteria
- ATM

The S. Donato district developed between the 1950s and 1970s due to demographic development, hosting mainly refugees and workers in those years.
In 1978 work began on the Fiera District, i.e. the city business center designed by Kenzō Tange at the end of the 1960s. The first towers will be inaugurated in 1983, but the works will only be completed in 2011. This has given the neighborhood a more modern look, with many services.
host_about: Amante del turismo e dell'ospitalità.

name: Wonderful Italy | Classic Marconi Apartment
description: Bright apartment with two balconies in the historical centre of Bologna, a few steps away from the Modern Art Museum.
neighborhood_overview:
Bologna is a city of art, culture and trade. The capital of Emilia-Romagna is also known as “Dotta” (erudite), being the oldest university of the West, as “Grassa” (fat) for its gastronomic delights and “Rossa” (red) for the colours characterising its old town,
Its soul is in the medieval old town, one of the biggest in Europe, dotted in taverns, workshops and theatres, characterised by almost 40 kms of porticoes. In the city centre there is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are the Fountain of Neptune by Giambologna and the Medieval Towers, “Torre degli Asinelli” and “Torre della Garisenda”, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in several museums, art galleries and religious buildings.
It is allowed to leave Bologna only after having tried its gastronomic products, among which mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla bolognese while sipping famous Doc wines from the Bologna hills! Rich in exhibitions
host_about:
Wonderful Italy is the largest Italian company of hospitality and experiences, in terms of number of directly-managed holiday homes and marketed tourist experiences. 

In addition to Emilia-Romagna, we are active in Sicily, Sardinia, Apulia, Campania, Liguria, Piedmont, Lake Garda, Lake Como and Venice, with an offer of over 2,000 homes and 350 experiences.

name: La Boheme Confortevole
neighborhood_overview: In the beating heart of Bologna, the apartment is located in one of the side streets of Via Independenza ten minutes walk from the Two Towers, Piazza Maggiore and the Jewish Ghetto.
host_about:
Sono una romana trasferita a Bologna per amore diversi anni fa.
Il mio lavoro consiste in organizzare eventi, allestimenti floreali e creazione di accessori moda da sposa e non, come i cappelli.
Mi piace passeggiare e conoscere le città scoprendole a piedi, perdendomi per le vie poco battute e i quartieri abitati dalle persone locali.
Assaggio le nuove culture attraverso la gastronomia che l 'italia offre variegata in ogni piccolo paese diverso e oltre all'amore per il gusto l'altra cosa che mi spinge a viaggiare e seguire la musica visto anche che il mio compagno è un chitarrista blues.
Diventata mamma da un paio di anni scopro nuove mete anche seguendo i gusti di mia figlia quindi il mio modo di viaggiare  ha un approccio diverso..prima visitavo le grandi città dove la frenesia del vedere piu cose possibili e vivere maggiori esperienze possibili era la colonna sonora della mia permanenza, ora prediligo posti piu comodi, la calma e la comodità..posso definirmi una viaggiatrice quasi completa!
Essere un host per me vuol dire accogliere le persone facendole sentire a casa e non "stranieri in visita" proprio come piacerebbe a me essere accolta e vivere la vera città quella che gli abitanti stessi vivono nel loro quotidiano.
Quindi nell'appartamento troverete consigli su dove e come poter avere un'esperienza unica a Bologna in posti che piacciono a me.

name: Appartamento moderno vicino a tutto!
description:
Entire apartment for rent in a strategic location in Bologna.
Equipped with every comfort: Jacuzzi, parquet, terrace, full kitchen, air conditioning, wi-fi and smart TV with sound sorround.
Located on the first floor of a nice building in a quiet residential area with free parking, parks, supermarkets and restaurants.
Bologna Station (2.5 km) - Airport (6 km) - Highway (1 km) -
Bus stop at 70 mt. Historic center at only 4 km. Bologna Fair: 6.0 Km.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the Navile neighborhood, quiet residential area with free parking, parks, supermarkets and restaurants.

There are 14 parks and 67 public gardens. The main ones are:
Villa Angeletti Park (1 Km), a green area that extends for about 8.5 hectares, along the right bank of the Navile Canal. It hosts a long strip of natural vegetation that offers the possibility of educational activities and naturalistic observation.
Parco dei Giardini (3 Km) known in the Bolognese dialect as Cà Bûra, covers 9 hectares and is characterized by a central lake where numerous water birds live.
Broschi Park (1 Km), also called Yellow House, a real oxygen lung for the citizens of the area. The garden is located near the place where once stood the villa where the famous singer Farinelli lived from 1761 to 1782. There is a play area in the garden.

name: The Writer's House
description:
The Writer's House, located in the heart of Bologna, is the place where comfort meets tranquility.
Situated close to the most iconic buildings of the city, the house allows easy access to everything that Bologna offers.
The quiet gardens that surround the apartment make it the ideal place to relax after a long stroll around the city center or at the end of a stressful day at work.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located inside one of the greatest buildings of Bologna, in the heart of Santo Stefano neighbourhood, right in the city centre. The biggest attractions of the city such as Le Due Torri, Piazza Maggiore, Piazza Santo Stefano and Piazza San Domenico are at a walking distance. The zone is well connected thanks to the public transports and rich in all services: bars, ice cream shops, restaurants, pastry shops, supermarkets and laundry services are close to the apartment.

name: Attico vista San Luca
description:
Exclusive bright penthouse overlooking the Basilica of San Luca.

Surrounded by greenery, it offers 5 cozy rooms (4 double and 1 double with single beds), two bathrooms, kitchen and terrace of 100 m2.

Just 3 km from the center, reachable in 20 minutes by bus (stop 300m away). Parking upon request and exclusive, for small cars in the condominium courtyard, ensuring comfort and tranquility. An elegant retreat for short stays immersed in simplicity and convenience
neighborhood_overview:
There are plenty of amenities and amenities for the neighborhood.
Public transport stops are 300m from the property and offer the possibility to reach each area of Bologna.
A gastronomy is just a few meters from the accommodation where you can find the specialties of Bolognese cuisine and more.
The nearest supermarket is 200 meters away and the ATM services are also a short distance away.
On the corner of Via Don Sturzo is a pharmacy, and an iconic local cooking trattoria a few meters from it, Da Boni.
For athletes and soccer enthusiasts, about 1km away from the property is the Renato Dall 'Ara soccer stadium that hosts the home games of Bologna football club 1909.

Boat like one of the pulsating hearts of peasant civilization, first, and industrialization, then. Historically, until the early 20th century the neighborhood did not exist as such, but it was immersed in the Bolognese countrys

contact directly before to book

different beds but in the firt room one matrimonial bed and down in the room underground we can prepare other beds but for people up 2 the other space in the same room underground
neighborhood_overview: quiet neighborhood, the apartment has a separate entrance. name: Appartamento Completo e Giardino
description: Relax with all the families in this quiet place.
neighborhood_overview:
The Navile, which takes its name from the canal of the same name that crosses the territory, is a quiet residential neighborhood but with numerous bars, restaurants and supermarkets. Located in a strategic area to reach the main destinations, it is characterized by the many green areas. There are 14 parks and 67 public gardens. The main ones are:
​Villa Angeletti Park (1 km from the apartment), a green area that develops for about 8.5 hectares, along the right bank of the Navile canal. It houses a long range of natural vegetation that offers the possibility of educational activities and naturalistic observation.
Parco dei Giardini (3 Km) known in the Bolognese dialect as Cà Bûra, covers 9 hectares and is characterized by a central lake where numerous water birds live.
Broschi Park (1 Km), also called Yellow House, a real oxygen lung for the citizens of the area. The garden is located near the place where once stood the villa where the famous singer Farinelli lived from 1

name: Bologna Accommodation Fiera 3
description:
Relax in this quiet space in a location slightly out of the center of Bologna and in a building with 1940s architecture.
The apartment of about 60 square meters is completely renovated and enriched with every comfort and equipment for a pleasant and long stay. Nearby there are shops and facilities to ensure every type of service, from the supermarket, bar, pharmacy, restaurants, etc. and convenient means of transport. Parking is public just below the house.
host_about: Sono un'imprenditrice bolognese, che da anni sul territorio di Bologna si dedica ad un'attività legata al Business&Holiday rentals (gestione di case vacanze e affitti brevi), che adoro.  Con "Bologna Accommodation" ho esaudito il desiderio di ospitare e permettere ai miei ospiti di conoscere la mia città, mostrandone i segreti, le specialità e le sfaccettature che pochi bolognesi veramente conoscono. Per me e il mio team è un'immensa soddisfazione far sentire gli ospiti a casa e far scoprir loro la Bologna autentica che solo i veri local sono in grado di mettere in mostra.

name: Garden Loft Asinelli Tower
neighborhood_overview:
The Jewish ghetto in Bologna is definitely the most evocative and is one of the most interesting memory neighborhoods, a short walk to the two towers.

To date, in fact, it has kept the original medieval urban structure intact.

The complex of streets, covered bridges and small windows, craft shops, food and design shops, make the former Bolognese Jewish ghetto remain one of the most interesting and particular areas in the city.
host_about:
Ciao siamo AffittiBreviPlus,

Offriamo soggiorni in case uniche nei luoghi più affascinanti di Bologna e Ferrara.
Nella nostra attività vogliamo supportare lo spirito imprenditoriale di chi, come noi, crede che l'accoglienza del turista sia una fondamentale risorsa per il proprio sviluppo. 
Siamo un'azienda italiana, con solide radici sul territorio. 

Sceglici se vuoi vivere un esperienza a 5 ★★★★★

name: We Home - HOUSE OF STARS - Bologna
description:

Enjoy your stay in this unique and relaxing space:

neighborhood_overview:
In the lively district of San Donato is the CUBE (Centro Unipol Bologna), a public space that hosts art exhibitions, workshops and live music.
The Bologna Fair, another large exhibition space, is used for conferences dedicated to different sectors, such as video games and agricultural machines. Informal bars in the area are popular with students, while handy restaurants and street food kiosks offer Italian, Chinese and Indian specialties.
San Donato is one of the most varied residential districts of the city: young students away from the policies without logic of rent in the historic center, elderly people looking for a quiet place for their grandchildren and a cultural melting pot not indifferent made by activities and residents from the most varied cultures. Itis perhaps the most balanced neighborhood within all these worlds with very different purposes and lifestyles.
Just off the bridge it is possible to find the Sonato Market, the name by which the San Donato Marke

host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: UR-NEST Filanda
description:
*Elevator out of order until October 20th 2024.

Modern and bright 85 sqm three-room apartment located in Bologna, on the 7th floor of a residential building with lift (access without steps) in the Saragozza district. The property has an unassigned parking space inside the condominium courtyard, and a pleasant panoramic terrace overlooking the Basilica of San Luca.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a verdant residential area, extremely convenient, outside Porta Saragozza, not far from Casalecchio di Reno.
Located in the immediate vicinity of the Terme Felsinee, the apartment is not far from the important Ospedale Maggiore, the Stadio dall'Ara and the Unipol Arena. The property is easily accessible by car thanks to its proximity to the Bologna ring road, and at the same time allows you to get to the historic centre very quickly through Viale Sandro Pertini.
The neighborhood is surrounded by public parks and it is possible to find numerous nearby shops, two supermarkets, a bank and a post office a few steps from the house. Not far away, there's the portico of San Luca, which is the longest porticoed walkway in the world. It allows you to reach the top of the hill where the religious sanctuary of the same name is located, which is also visible from the windows of the house.
host_about:
UR NEST - the Home Feeling you deserve!

Professional host with more than 60 apartments between Bologna - Milano - Firenze. 

I like to travel and I love to show the beauty of our cities.

neighborhood_overview: Bologna is a city of art, culture and trade. The capital of Emilia-Romagna is also known as “Dotta” (erudite), being the oldest university of the West, as “Grassa” (fat) for its gastronomic delights and “Rossa” (red) for the colors characterizing its old town. Its soul is in the medieval old town, one of the biggest in Europe, dotted in taverns, workshops and theaters, characterized by almost 40 km of porticoes. In the city center there is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are the Fountain of Neptune by Giambologna and the Medieval Towers, “Torre degli Asinelli” and “Torre della Garisenda”, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in several museums, art galleries and religious buildings. It is allowed to leave Bologna only after having tried its gastronomic products, among which mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla bolognese while sipping famous Doc wines from the Bologna hills! Rich in exhibitions, fairs and c

description: Elegant penthouse located in the heart of the historic center of Bologna, with a large furnished terrace overlooking towers and rooftops of Bologna. Located on the top floor of a prestigious building with elevator, it consists of entrance on large living area with double sofa bed, fully equipped kitchen, sleeping area with 2 bedrooms of which one with 2 single beds and one double, 2 bathrooms, one with shower and one with bathtub,  air conditioning and unlimited wifi.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is in the heart of the city, between the two towers and the main square of the city, Piazza Maggiore, close to the streets full of local and typical shops.
From here you can reach all the main attractions of the city on foot:

Piazza Maggiore: 1 minute walk
Two towers: 3 minutes
Archiginnasio: 3 minutes
Basilica di Santo Stefano: 5 minutes
Basilica di San Domenico: 7 minutes
Basilica of San Francesco: 10 minutes

name: M.G. Home 2 a un passo da tutto
description:
Just 15 minutes from downtown, you'll find a renovated accommodation equipped with all the comforts you need to stay in absolute relaxation; a few steps from the house, the coop, pam, pharmacy, local market, various restaurants, and pizzerias, the bus stop 13-11-39 to comfortably reach the fair, the center of Bologna, and the station. We are very close to the Rizzoli Sant'Orsola and Toniolo hospital.
You will have breakfast included so as to start the day with the right spirit.
neighborhood_overview:
Very well-kept residential neighborhood a short walk from the center which can be reached either with a nice walk of about twenty minutes or by taking line number 13 which with a few stops you will be in the center very convenient even to get to the fair, I'll take line 39 and I leave you in front of the entrance of the fair it is very convenient even to go to the station or get there from the station with line number 11 .
The neighborhood has everything you need to stay in absolute comfort, it is a very quiet neighborhood where you can walk around in absolute safety, in a few steps there is the TABACCHI DA GIO that offers many services and is provided with bus tickets and much more.
Near the property you can find many supermarkets pharmacies,restaurants of various kinds, Thai Chinese type classic Bolognese cuisine and pizzerias.
host_about:
Sono una persona molto carismatica e enpatica, penso di essere anche una persona simpatica e molto paziente anche perché altrimenti non potrei fare il Barista :-) lavoro che adoro e che mi permette di essere sempre a contatto con le persone.
Mi piace molto essere a disposizione del prossimo e cerco e spero di poter sempre regalare un sorriso alle persone. 
Adoro l’educazione è il rispetto per il prossimo.
E sono un fun sfegatato della moto gp

name: AffittiChiari a Bologna
description:
Welcome to the apartment of Affitti Chiari, located in Bologna.
A few steps from Ospedale Maggiore, the property offers unparalleled comfort, with the city center and Porta San Felice less than a kilometer away.
Central Station 2.5 km on foot
Renato Dallara Stadium and San Luca, both just 1.5 km away.
For concert lovers, the Unipol Arena is only 8 km away and is easily accessible by bus, right below the house.
Also, the airport can be reached by line 944.
neighborhood_overview:
The property is located in the Porto Zaragoza district.

The Porto Saragozza District consists of the western half of the historic center of Bologna (with monumental buildings of note including the headquarters of the Collegio di Spagna, the sixteenth-century architecture of Palazzo Albergati, the Maremoti and Sassoli de' Bianchi palaces in Via Barberia, the basilicas of Santissimo Salvatore and San Paolo Maggiore) and the southwest suburbs of the city, including a part of the hills.

In its territory there are: the Central Station of Bologna, the Certosa, the Renato Dall 'Ara Stadium, the Sanctuary of the Blessed Virgin of San Luca with its Portico, the university faculties of Engineering and Industrial Chemistry, the departments of Communication Disciplines and Dams, the MAMbo, the Cineteca of Bologna, the Primo Levi University, the Medieval Civic Museum, Spazio DumBO, etc...

name: Rizzoli d'Oro Casa Vacanze
description: A few steps from the Rizzoli Hospital, also reachable on foot, the Rizzoli D'Oro holiday home is located at the Former Officine of the Rizzoli Orthopedic Institute, in a modern and recently renovated complex, in a quiet area and a few steps from all amenities.
host_about:
BoscoBo nasce da un sogno che abbiamo inseguito per molto tempo. 

La gioia di vivere, le atmosfere semplici di una vita sostenibile vissuta in armonia con la natura e la valorizzazione della bellezza dei luoghi.

Il tutto ispirato ai principi dello slow living.

L’avventura è appena cominciata e desideriamo condividere tutto questo con i nostri graditi ospiti.

Stéphanie & Ivano

BoscoBo is a dream of a suistainable life, simple atmosphere in harmony with the nature.

We believe in the principles of a "slow living" and  "slow traveling".

Cyclist, Families with kids, Backpackers are particularly welcome.

Now that the adventure has begun, we'd like to share all this with our friends and guests.

Stéphanie & Ivano

name: "Ci Vuole Leggerezza" Apartment  Free Parking
description:
Bright and large fully renovated apartment a stone's throw from Bologna.

Apartment of over 80sqm with two large bedrooms, the first double, the second with French bed and smart-working desk, large bathroom with glass-wall shower and washing machine.

The property is completed by a large living room with kitchenette equipped with induction burners, coffee machine with complimentary pods, kettle and a large Smart TV to enjoy your favorite TV series.

Free parking on the street
neighborhood_overview:
We are located in the heart of the picturesque "Santa-Viola" neighborhood, a historic area of Bologna that offers a wide selection of restaurants, pizzerias and essential services such as supermarkets and pharmacies. Here you can find everything you need and want, right at your fingertips.

Among the gastronomic gems, the institution "Nonna Rosa" stands out, where you will have the opportunity to taste the most delicious Bolognese cotoletta in the world, along with other unique delicacies. In addition, the renowned "Pizzeria Due Lune" will make you taste an excellent pizza, representing the authentic heart of the Italian tradition.

A few steps away you will find the historic and delicious "Pasticceria Asta", an ideal place for dreamy breakfasts.

The neighborhood is characterized by numerous parks and green areas.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Via Piella, a picturesque street in the heart of Bologna. This charming area is one of the city's hidden gems, combining traditional history and charm with a modern, lively atmosphere.

Imagine walking the narrow cobbled streets of Via Piella, surrounded by brightly colored historic buildings. Traditional architecture blends with cozy cafes, stylish boutiques, and trendy restaurants, creating a unique and fascinating environment.

The location of Via Piella is just perfect. Within walking distance you will find the main attractions of Bologna, such as the famous Piazza Maggiore with its majestic Basilica of San Petronio and the Palazzo d 'Accursio. From here, you can also explore the Tortellini Towers, symbols of the city, and the charming Mezzo Market, where you can enjoy local culinary delicacies.

neighborhood_overview: Bologna is a city of art, culture and trade. The capital of Emilia-Romagna is also known as “Dotta” (erudite), being the oldest university of the West, as “Grassa” (fat) for its gastronomic delights and “Rossa” (red) for the colors characterizing its old town. Its soul is in the medieval old town, one of the biggest in Europe, dotted in taverns, workshops and theaters, characterized by almost 40 km of porticoes. In the city center there is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are the Fountain of Neptune by Giambologna and the Medieval Towers, “Torre degli Asinelli” and “Torre della Garisenda”, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in several museums, art galleries and religious buildings. It is allowed to leave Bologna only after having tried its gastronomic products, among which mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla bolognese while sipping famous Doc wines from the Bologna hills! Not to be missed are Giambologna's Neptune Fountain and the Medieval Towers, the Asinelli and the Garisenda, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in the numerous museums, galleries and religious buildings. name: UR-NEST Borgo San Pietro
description: Beautiful 130 m2 apartment consisting of two bedrooms, study room, dining room, separate kitchen, bathroom and balcony. The property is located on the second floor (with elevator) of a building in the center of Bologna, 10-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore and adjacent to the bus stop to reach the Fairgrounds and the Railway Station.
neighborhood_overview: It is an area that gravitates around Piazza Maggiore (Church of San Petronio, one of Italy’s most important churches, Palazzo d'Accursio, Museo Morandi, the municipal art collections, Palazzo Re Enzo, and the Civic Museum), the imposing Piazza Nettuno with the beautiful fountain by Giambologna, the former Sala Borsa, home to a large multimedia library, and the Two Towers, dating back to the twelve century. In the vicinity, you can find a cluster of intertwined narrow streets featuring spice markets, pubs, trendy clubs, as well as typical and historical food stores. A convenient supermarket is located a few steps from the property and you only have to walk a few steps to reach some of Bologna’s most famous restaurants.

name: Bologna’s Way Toscanini
description:
This spacious and bright apartment with two bedrooms and two balconies is located on the second floor (without elevator) of a residential building at the beginning of the famous Bolognese hills, in a quiet and nature-immersed setting.

Guests have access to the entire house, full use of the kitchen, and linens and towels are provided. Upon arrival, our staff will be at the apartment to explain how the facilities work and to hand over the keys.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a residential area surrounded by nature, extremely comfortable, outside Porta San Mamolo.

The apartment is located not far from the important Rizzoli Hospital and Villa Ghigi. The entrance to the largest park in Bologna is only a 4-minute walk away, allowing guests to take a pleasant walk in the middle of nature, admiring in the background a beautiful view from the top of the entire city.
The property is easily reached by car thanks to its proximity to the Bologna ring road and at the same time allows you to quickly reach the historic center.
The neighborhood is surrounded by public parks and some nearby shops, a bank, post office, and an ice cream shop kiosk.

When in Bologna we speak of "quadrilatero", we mean that very central area between Via Rizzoli-via dell 'Archiginnasio-via Farini-via Castiglione which forms, in fact, a geometric figure on four sides. neighborhood_overview: Bologna, known as the "Dotta" being the home of the oldest University in the West, the "Grassa" for its food and wine excellence and the "Rossa" color that characterizes the historic center, is a wonderful city of art, culture and commerce. Its soul lies in the medieval historic center that is among the largest in Europe and full of taverns, stores and theaters, characterized by nearly 40 km of arcades. In the historic center is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of medieval buildings blends perfectly with modernity. Don't miss Giambologna's Neptune Fountain and the Medieval Towers, that of the Asinelli and the Garisenda, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in the many museums, galleries and religious buildings. It is impossible to leave Bologna without tasting its food and wine products, including mortadella, tortellini, and ragù alla Bolognese accompanied by the well-known Doc wines of the Colli Bolognesi! Rich in exhibitions, fairs and cultural events, Bologna is a city that ca

name: Casa Bibiena, prestigiosa dimora
description:
Prestigious Palace in the center of Bologna, between Via Marsala and Via Valdonica, embellished with the scenic staircase made around the middle of the 18th century by Carlo Sicinio Bibiena.
A corner of excellence in the heart of the city that can accommodate up to 6 people in 2 spacious rooms furnished in style and a living room with double sofa bed. In the heart of the city, in a unique and strategic location.
neighborhood_overview:
In the heart of the city, the apartment overlooks the Jewish Ghetto, an urban area of the city that still retains its original structure.
A few steps from Piazza Maggiore, one of the most enchanting squares in Italy, adjacent to Via Indipendenza, the main hub of shopping and always a few steps from the pedestrianized area of the 'Quadrilateral’, bordered by typical clubs, trattorias and the ancient market of medieval origin where antiquity and modernity merge and gastronomic shopping is a must.

description: Our vacation home "The window on the garden" is an accommodation located on the first floor of a building with an elevator, located in the green area, near the Bologna Fair and a few minutes from the Bologna Centro train station and also well connected to the Azienda Ospedaliera Sant'Orsola Malpighi of Bologna.
neighborhood_overview:
San Donato is one of the most diverse residential neighborhoods in the city
As soon as you get off the San Donato bridge you can find the Mercato S. Donato: about 10/15 years ago it was the largest regional market in the city, it is now used for cultural events, something organic hipster, activities managed by young boys with the challenge of being an attractive pole around the neighborhood.
San Donato is made like this, the sky is often clear but when the sun shines there is a yellow one that is reflected on all the houses on Via San Donato. Via San Donato, a road that connects the historic center to the most foggy Emilian lower, slowly and continuing to the province, the visibility falls in autumn, while in summer there are only the stars to illuminate everything. Via San Donato passes through the Pilastro, a size Quarto Inferiore and its small/medium-sized businesses and then Granarolo DellEmilia onwards reaches the province and the land, the real one.
In Adam Mickiew

name: Irnerio 39 by Studio Vita
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the heart of the city centre, less than 10 minutes walking far from Piazza Maggiore and the Two Towers.
host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: Residenza Santo Stefano 95
description:
The Residenza Santo Stefano 95 apartment is in the center of Bologna and has a large terrace. The accommodation is 1.4 km from the Archiginnasio of Bologna and has free WiFi.
The apartment has 2 bedroom air conditioning, a living room with sofa bed, a fully equipped kitchenette with refrigerator, microwave, microwave, dishwasher, dishwasher, oven and coffee maker, and 1 bathroom with bidet and shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.
neighborhood_overview:
Residenza Santo Stefano 95 is located 1.1 km from the Archiginnasio of Bologna, 1.0 km from the two Towers, 0.6 km from the Seven Churches of Piazza Santo Stefano, 1.8 km from the Rizzoli hospital and 1, 1 km from Sant'Orsola hospital.
You will stay 11 km from the airport and 3 km from Bologna Central Station.
Near the house there are bus stops in both directions with which you can reach the historic center or the central train station in a few minutes.

name: Santo Stefano Apartment
neighborhood_overview:
The Santo Stefano neighborhood is one of six neighborhoods in Bologna and surrounds the historic center of the city on the east side. Most of Bologna's attractions are located here, as the neighborhood includes the former Jewish Ghetto, the university district, the two towers, the Quadrilatero area, the Bologna Archiginnasio, and Piazza Santo Stefano.
The most historic area of the Santo Stefano neighborhood falls within the walls that houses the historic center and includes the areas adjacent to two of the most important squares in the entire city: Piazza Maggiore and Piazza Santo Stefano which, together with the homonymous street, gives the neighborhood its name.

neighborhood_overview:
San Mamolo is one of the most renowned neighborhoods in Bologna, at the foot of the hills, a short walk to the center.
Surrounded by greenery, the area is quiet and well served, connected to the center by one of the city's most famous streets, Via D’Azeglio.
In addition to services in close proximity such as groceries, pharmacies, tobacco shops, etc., there are places with a variety of choices in the proposals.
There are also several parks, such as Villa Ghigi or San Michele in the woods, which offer suggestive panoramic views of the city in the setting of the Bolognese hills, as well as green trails for hiking lovers.
In the area just steps away from the BeHappy there is also the Rizzoli Hospital.

description: Comfortable and modern apartment in a building in Via Mascarella 9, a street full of restaurants and pubs in the heart of the university area of the city.
neighborhood_overview: Bologna, known as the "Dotta" being the home of the oldest University in the West, the "Grassa" for its food and wine excellence and the "Rossa" color that characterizes the historic center, is a wonderful city of art, culture and commerce. Its soul lies in the medieval historic center that is among the largest in Europe and full of taverns, stores and theaters, characterized by nearly 40 km of arcades. description:
BeHappyS is located in the magical setting of the Bolognese hills and a short walk from the center, in a privileged location, out of the ZTL and within reach of all the main attractions of the city.
The area is well served by shops, groceries, nightclubs, parks, bus stops as well as Rizzoli Hospital.
neighborhood_overview:
San Mamolo is one of the most renowned neighborhoods in Bologna, at the foot of the hills, a short walk to the center.
Surrounded by greenery, the area is quiet and well served, connected to the center by one of the city's most famous streets, Via D’Azeglio.
In addition to services in close proximity such as groceries, pharmacies, tobacco shops, etc., there are places with a variety of choices in the proposals.
There are also several parks, such as Villa Ghigi or San Michele in the woods, which offer suggestive panoramic views of the city in the setting of the Bolognese hills, as well as green trails for hiking lovers.
In the area just steps away from the BeHappy there is also the Rizzoli Hospital.

name: Realkasa Charming Luxury Apt.
description: This elegant and modern apartment is located in the heart of Bologna's historic center, on the first floor (without an elevator) in a very quiet area and just a few steps from Piazza Maggiore, the Two Towers, and the city's main attractions. The apartment is finely furnished with designer furniture and offers all the necessary comforts for a pleasant stay. It consists of a living room with a fully equipped kitchenette, three double bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a large terrace.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the historic center of the city. Piazza Maggiore can be reached on foot in just over 5 minutes. With a pleasant walk, you can reach the city's main artistic and historical points of interest such as Piazza Maggiore, Palazzo Albergati, which hosts numerous exhibitions, the Seven Churches in Piazza Santo Stefano, the characteristic Jewish Ghetto, the Archiginnasio, which was the seat of the historic University of Bologna, and the Teatro Comunale.
Just a few steps from the apartment is the famous Mercato delle Erbe (Via Belvedere), a recently renovated structure where you can purchase local products or sit at one of the numerous restaurants or typical venues surrounding the building.

Attraverso il mio staff gestisco e valorizzo proprietà nella città di Bologna per garantire un soggiorno ai miei ospiti di alto livello, piacevole ed in tutta sicurezza. Vi aspettiamo nella nostra splendida città!

neighborhood_overview: it is in the heart of the Old Town,  few meters far from the main square Piazza Maggiore, the Towers and Quadrilatero market
host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

Italianway è il tuo migliore compagno di viaggio!

name: Marconi Skyline
description:
Welcome to our Home.
Our brand-new apartment is located in Bologna’s vibrant downtown, in Via Marconi.
Both contemporary and cozy, our apartment offers comfortable spaces for your stay featuring a large living room, a fully furnished kitchen with bar counter and dining table, three bedrooms and two complete bathrooms. At a rare height for the city centre, from the 7th floor (out of 8) you may enjoy a wonderful view above Bologna’s characteristic red roofs.
neighborhood_overview: Via Marconi and the neighbourhood around is full of shops and points of interest. In less than 5 mins walking there are 3 supermarkets (PAM, COOP, Aldi), 2 Pharmacies (“Farmacia Sant’Anna” and “Farmacia del Porto”), 1 Gelateria (“Delizie della Riva”), ATMs and several cafés/restaurants, among other stores. Within the same distance, you may visit the MAMbo – Modern Art Museum of Bologna, the Lumiere – Movie Library of Bologna and a small green oasis at “Parco 11 Settembre”. You may also experience the local market of fresh bio food (fruits, vegetables, bread, diary, etc) as a genuine “Bolognese”, available only on Saturday mornings at the Lumiere square. The majority of buses that goes through downtown stops at the bus stop in front of the building entrance (“Piazza dei Martiri” and “Marconi” stops).

name: Wonderful Italy | Charming Mazzini Apartment
description: Spacious and bright newly renovated apartment in Mazzini district of Bologna.
neighborhood_overview: Bologna, known as the "Dotta" because it is the seat of the oldest university in the West, the "Grassa" for its excellent food and wine and the "Rossa" color that characterizes the historic center, is a wonderful city of art, culture, and commerce. Its soul lies in its medieval historical center, which is among the largest in Europe and full of taverns, shops, and theatres, characterized by almost 40 km of arcades. In the historical center is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of the medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are Giambologna's Neptune Fountain and the Medieval Towers, the Asinelli, and the Garisenda, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in the numerous museums, galleries, and religious buildings. It is impossible to leave Bologna without tasting its food and wine products, including mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla Bolognese accompanied by the well-known Doc wines of the Colli Bolognesi! Rich in exhibitions, fairs, and cultural event
host_about:

name: Historic Center | Unique Layout w/ private garden
description:
⭐⭐⭐⭐ Charming Lodge with Private Garden near Piazza Maggiore - A Cozy City Retreat

Escape to our enchanting oasis in Bologna, an essential yet charming space featuring 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a fully equipped kitchen. While the indoor spaces are compact, this retreat is enhanced by a large private garden that provides a peaceful sanctuary in the heart of the city. Located just moments from the vibrant center, our apartment offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience.
neighborhood_overview:
🏙️ Neighborhood: Via del Borgo di San Pietro, Bologna
Via del Borgo di San Pietro is a charming street in the heart of Bologna, perfectly blending modern city life with historical allure. Staying here, you’ll be ideally positioned to explore the city’s most iconic attractions, all within walking distance!

🏛️ Piazza Maggiore: Just 800m away (around 10 minutes on foot), this is the bustling heart of Bologna, surrounded by stunning buildings like the Basilica of San Petronio and the Palazzo d'Accursio.

🏰 The Two Towers (Le Due Torri): At 950m (about 12 minutes walking), you can climb the Asinelli Tower for a spectacular view of the city!

🎨 The Archiginnasio of Bologna: Located 1 km away (13 minutes on foot), this historic building is home to the famous Teatro Anatomico.

🍽️ Mercato di Mezzo: A foodie’s paradise just 850m away (10 minutes walking), where you can indulge in local products and traditional Bolognese dishes.

name: Urban Jungle
description:
Relax in the garden and covered terrace 5 min walking from the city center
Retaining it's old Bolognese features, this charming apartment offers you an authentic experience with the ease of reaching the most celebrated attractions from a residential area.The real star of the show is the large outdoor patio and garden, complete with seating, potted plants and verdant foliage. Enjoy alfresco breakfasts in the morning sunshine and sip a chilled glass of wine in the balmy summer evenings.
host_about:
Pietro has a whole artistic education from high school to university. He’s a painter and most of our homes has a beautiful painting or drawing from his collection .. we are plunged to the art world and have many friends who expose their work in our homes
Gaia,have a degree in architecture in politecnico di Milano and then studied fashion merchandising at parson school in nyc then had an education in tailoring in the amazing Bagatto private school in Bologna ...
I normally sew items from our homes and make a lot of research in flea markets and antiques of little items to add and change details in our decor ...
We love to travel as a family of 4 and love to live in our homes when they are not booked just to experience the strengths and weaknesses to improve to our homes 
We live most of the time in Bologna our hometown and speak Italian English French and Spanish ...
We aim to connect each and every guests to the territory where they choose to stay,what we also live about our job is organizing weddings in our properties this is the best way to connect them to the area Musician, florists, caterings and many more local  vendors ...

name: Casa vacanze Giacobbi
description:
Beautiful apartment with attention to detail located in a quiet and elegant residential area a few steps from the center. From the building you can comfortably reach all places of interest in this wonderful city. You can easily reach the main hospitals by buses.
The house is equipped with every modern comfort and stands out for its refinement and attention to detail, located on the second floor without an elevator of an old building typical of the 1930s.
neighborhood_overview:
The house is in the heart of the Costa-Saragozza neighborhood.
The neighborhood is quiet and residential and borders the old walls of the historic center, which is easily accessible on foot. On the two main streets, Andrea Costa and Zaragoza are small convenience stores as well as cozy cafes and restaurants. In the small side streets you can admire Art Nouveau houses that characterize this beautiful neighborhood.
The neighborhood is home to the Sanctuary of the Madonna di San Luca and its porch. It is a true symbol of the city, on par with the two Towers and Neptune. The arcade that leads from Via Zaragoza to the Sanctuary is the longest in the world consisting of no less than 666 arches and 15 chapels. During this magnificent walk you will pass by characteristic pedecollinary parks such as Villa delle Rose and Villa Spada that offer views of the city with beautiful views.

an entire apartment at your disposal with spacious and quiet spaces, two free parking spaces from which to reach the center in twelve minutes, the Meraville shopping center in two minutes, just seven minutes by car you will find an eight-hectare park that houses Fico, inside which you will find shops, restaurants and many local fresh products.

name: Realkasa Santo Stefano 46 Apt.
description:
Apartment located in the historic center and composed of 2 double bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a living room with equipped kitchen.
The bedrooms are spacious and bright, with double beds and wardrobes. The bathrooms are modern and equipped with all comforts, the living room is large and comfortable, with a sofa bed.
The apartment is completely finished and tastefully furnished. It is the ideal place for an unforgettable stay in Bologna.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a strategic area in the "historic" residential area of ​​the center of Bologna.
Leaving the house with a pleasant walk it is possible to immerse yourself in the numerous points of historical and artistic interest such as the Seven Churches in Piazza Santo Stefano, the characteristic Jewish Ghetto, the Archiginnasio which was the seat of the historic university of Bologna, the Teatro Comunale, piazza Large with the Basilica of San Petronio as well as the famous Via D'Azeglio and Galleria Cavour where we can find the shops of the most famous brands.
A tour of the food and wine boutiques and taverns throughout the center, especially in the Quadrilatero, is also highly recommended.
Being in the southern part of the historic center, from Realkasa Lovin House it is easy to reach Giardini Margherita, the largest and most popular city park.
The Sant'Orsola polyclinic is less than 10 minutes away on foot.
host_about: Ciao! Sono DAVIDE, sono un SuperHost con anni di esperienza nel settore delle locazioni brevi/turistiche. Sono socio dell’agenzia Immobiliare Realkasa presente su Bologna da oltre 10 anni che si occupa di compravendite, locazioni e servizi legati all’ immobiliare tra i quali le locazioni brevi di cui sono il responsabile. Attraverso il mio staff gestisco e valorizzo proprietà nella città di Bologna per garantire un soggiorno ai miei ospiti di alto livello, piacevole ed in tutta sicurezza. Vi aspettiamo nella nostra splendida città!

name: Wonderful Italy | White Daisy Apartment
description: Modern apartment recently renovated, in the heart of the historic center of Bologna and a few steps from the "finestrella di Via Piella".
neighborhood_overview: Bologna, known as the "Dotta" because it is the seat of the oldest university in the West, the "Grassa" for its excellent food and wine and the "Rossa" color that characterizes the historic center, is a wonderful city of art, culture, and commerce. Its soul lies in its medieval historical center, which is among the largest in Europe and full of taverns, shops, and theatres, characterized by almost 40 km of arcades. In the historical center is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of the medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are Giambologna's Neptune Fountain and the Medieval Towers, the Asinelli, and the Garisenda, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in the numerous museums, galleries, and religious buildings. It is impossible to leave Bologna without tasting its food and wine products, including mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla Bolognese accompanied by the well-known Doc wines of the Colli Bolognesi! Rich in exhibitions, fairs, and cultural event
host_about:
Wonderful Italy is the largest Italian company of hospitality and experiences, in terms of number of directly-managed holiday homes and marketed tourist experiences. 

In addition to Emilia-Romagna, we are active in Sicily, Sardinia, Apulia, Campania, Liguria, Piedmont, Lake Garda, Lake Como and Venice, with an offer of over 2,000 homes and 350 experiences.

Italianway è il tuo migliore compagno di viaggio!

Italianway is your best travel mate!
Since 2015 we have welcomed more than 120,000 guests who have chosen our apartments from over 700 proposals thanks to the wide variety of types, size, style and location. Our team will take care of you from booking to check-out and will be at your disposal for any need.
All apartments have equipped kitchens and are equipped with linen and professional cleaning service to ensure quality standards and the comfort of a real home.

name: Elegant Penthouse | 4starbologna
description: This vacation home is the perfect retreat in the city, with outdoor spaces that make you dream. Whether you're planning a romantic getaway, a family reunion, or a vacation with friends here you'll find everything you need to make your experience unforgettable. With the center of Bologna within walking distance, you'll have the best restaurants, shops, and cultural attractions at your fingertips, ensuring a stay that combines the tranquility of a vacation home with the thrill of a vibrant city.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a strategic area of Bologna!
5 minutes walk from the central station, 200 meters from Via Indipendenza, the main street of walking and shopping, 10 minutes walk from the Two Towers, and close to the fairgrounds.
host_about:
Ciao a tutti, sono Pippo! 

Insieme al mio staff di 4 Star Bologna ci occupiamo della gestione di attività extra-alberghiere e strutture ricettive.
 
Ad oggi siamo presenti con più di 10 strutture sul territorio bolognese, tutte differenti fra loro poichè pensate per ogni specifica esigenza dei nostri ospiti. Abbiamo proposte specifiche adatte a:  coppie, lavoratori, famiglie e gruppi di amici.

Se state cercando un luogo dove trascorrere qualche giorno sentendovi come a casa, i nostri appartamenti e le nostre camere sono perfetti per voi!

Da anni ormai il principale obbiettivo di 4 Star è quello di rendere il soggiorno di ognuno dei nostri ospiti unico e speciale riservando loro tutte le attenzioni che ci si aspetterebbe di trovare in un hotel, ma nella comodità e autonomia che offre una casa vacanza.

Tutto questo è possibile grazie al nostro staff, un team altamente qualificato e compatto che sarà a vostra disposizione dal momento della prenotazione alla vostra partenza, sempre pronto ad esaudire ogni richiesta e ad aiutarvi in caso di qualsiasi necessità.

Vi aspettiamo a Bologna, non vediamo l'ora di accogliervi per farvi scoprire la nostra splendida città!

description:
Two quiet indipendent not adjoining next apartements in the same landing.

The apartment is within walking distance of the university quarter, throbbing with life day and night. A super market on the other side of the road, as well as pharmacy, greengrocer, a library and many typical restaurant.
In the closest pastry shop and bar are a couple of minutes away.
It's also conveniently close to the main bus routes.
To reach the heart of Bologna it takes no more than 20 minutes walk through the typical Bologna porticos.
host_about:

Nestled in the vibrant heart of Bologna📍, just steps from Piazza Maggiore, this enchanting 2-bedroom apartment offers the perfect blend of historical charm and modern amenities.

neighborhood_overview:
🏙️ Neighborhood: Via Agresti, Bologna
Via Agresti is a charming street in the heart of Bologna, offering a perfect blend of modern city life and historic charm. Staying here, you'll be ideally located to explore the city's iconic attractions, all within walking distance or a short ride away!

🏛️ Piazza Maggiore: Just 350m away (a 5-minute walk), this is the beating heart of Bologna, surrounded by beautiful buildings like the Basilica di San Petronio and the Palazzo d'Accursio.

🏰 The Two Towers (Le Due Torri): At 700m (about 9 minutes on foot), you can climb the Asinelli Tower for an unbeatable view of the city!

🎨 The Archiginnasio of Bologna: Only 400m (5-minute walk) from your door, this historical building is home to the famous Teatro Anatomico.

🍽️ Mercato di Mezzo: A foodie’s dream at just 500m (a 6-minute walk), where you can enjoy delicious local products and traditional Bolognese dishes.

🚶‍♂️ The Basilica of San Domenico:

name: Wonderful Italy | Family Elegant Apartment
description: Spacious and cozy apartment in the historic center of Bologna.
neighborhood_overview: Bologna, known as the "Dotta" because it is the seat of the oldest university in the West, the "Grassa" for its excellent food and wine and the "Rossa" color that characterizes the historic center, is a wonderful city of art, culture, and commerce. Its soul lies in its medieval historical center, which is among the largest in Europe and full of taverns, shops, and theatres, characterized by almost 40 km of arcades. In the historical center is Piazza Maggiore, where the charm of the medieval buildings is perfectly combined with modernity. Not to be missed are Giambologna's Neptune Fountain and the Medieval Towers, the Asinelli, and the Garisenda, part of a rich cultural heritage preserved in the numerous museums, galleries, and religious buildings. It is impossible to leave Bologna without tasting its food and wine products, including mortadella, tortellini, ragù alla Bolognese accompanied by the well-known Doc wines of the Colli Bolognesi! Rich in exhibitions, fairs, and cultural event
host_about:

name: Trilocale Tanholydays
description:
Cozy 75sqm apartment ideal for a stay in Bologna in the characteristic Zaragoza district, with its recently awarded arcades.
Outside ZTL and very convenient to reach the center on foot or by public transport. The accommodation is adjacent to the bike path of Bologna and at the foot of the building there is the Mobike stall where you can comfortably rent your e-bike and enjoy the city on 2 wheels.
neighborhood_overview:
The Porto-Saragozza District was born in 2016 from the merger of the previous Porto and Zaragoza neighborhoods. It consists of the western half of the historic center of Bologna - with monumental buildings of note including the headquarters of the Collegio di Spagna, the sixteenth-century architecture of Palazzo Albergati, the Maremoti and Sassoli de 'Bianchi palaces in Via Barberia, the basilicas of Santissimo Salvatore and San Paolo Maggiore - and from the southwest suburbs of the city, including a part of the hills.

In its territory there are: the Central Station of Bologna, the Certosa, the Renato Dall 'Ara Stadium, the Sanctuary of the Blessed Virgin of San Luca with its Portico, the university faculties of Engineering and Industrial Chemistry, the departments of Communication Disciplines and Dams, the MAMbo, the Cineteca of Bologna, the Primo Levi University, the Medieval Civic Museum, Spazio DumBO

host_about:
My name is Andrea, I am a tourism and hospitality expert.
I have been working in this field for over 30 years.
I started at the age of twenty working on cruise ships as a "factotum" and cruise ship boy.
From there I started to get interested in tourism.
Then i’ ve continued my career managing hotels and resorts in my beloved Sicily.
I live in Bologna since 2011 with my wife and I get along very well in this city full of young people and artistic and cultural ferment.
Furthermore I have been involved in the management of apartments and business in Bologna with my brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
Being bigger, I have surrounded myself by professional and friendly persons, all at your disposal for your stay.
With my collegues, we are a friendly, welcoming and available team with a big knowledge of all the city, we'll gives you useful tips in order to discover Bologna  as a bolognese does.

Mi chiamo Andrea, sono un appassionato di turismo ed ospitalità.
Da oltre 30 anni lavoro nell' ambiente.
Ho iniziato da appena ventenne imbarcandomi su navi da crociera come "giovanotto di coperta", che nel gergo navale significa un po' tuttofare!
Da qui ho iniziato ad appassionarmi al turismo.
Ho poi continuato la mia carriera gestendo hotel e resort nella mia amata Sicilia.
Negli ultimi 5 anni mi sono  occupato della gestione di appartamenti per vacanze e business con il mio brand "Studio Vita Apartments".
da quando il lavoro è aumentato, mi sono circondato di uno staff amichevole e professionale, a vostra completa disposizione.
Con i miei colleghi abbiamo creato un team esperto che saprà darvi utili consigli per vivere Bologna come la vivono i bolognesi.

name: Bright Apartment with Attic
description:
Large and bright apartment with attic in one of the most exclusive neighborhoods in the center of Bologna.
The apartment, finely renovated, is located on the third floor with lift in an elegant setting, a stone's throw from Porta Saragozza.
neighborhood_overview:
The area of Porta Saragozza, located in the historic center of Bologna, is rich in history and architectural charm. Built in the 13th century, this medieval gate was part of the city's ancient defensive walls. One of its main attractions is the Portico di San Luca, the longest portico in the world, which connects Porta Saragozza to the Sanctuary of the Madonna di San Luca.
The area is lively and popular, with numerous shops, cafes, restaurants, and points of historical and cultural interest. Among these are the Collegio di Spagna, founded in 1365, the Basilica of San Francesco with its Gothic architecture, Palazzo Albergati, which continually offers top-tier art exhibitions, and the vibrant and youthful Via del Pratello, known for its bustling nightlife. Porta Saragozza is a must-see for anyone visiting Bologna, offering a unique mix of history, culture, and modern life.
