name: Villa Bottrigari-5 Appartamenti
description:
Exclusive apartments within a Villa Liberty in the historic center of Bologna.
Access from Via Bottrigari (small internal street away from noise) in one of the most beautiful residential areas of Bologna. The arcades of San Luca are a 4-minute walk away. Via Zaragoza, one of the most iconic streets in Bologna, is only 5 minutes away by foot. Bologna's football stadium is 17 minutes by foot.
A 15-minute walk from Piazza Malpighi, 18 minutes from Piazza Maggiore and 2 Towers of Bologna.
host_about:
Hi! I am Rambaldo, the manager of BolognaRooms and Villa Tortorelli in Florence. I was born and raised in Bologna! I love to travel. 
I have several apartments and rooms on airbnb in the Bologna area, including historic houses and a beautiful  villa with pool in Florence's historic center.

I also rent out 4 apartments on Elba island, called "Marciana Hills Apartments"

name: Il Giardino d'Inverno Bologna
description:
The Winter Garden is born in a beautiful 18th-century palace in the historic center of Bologna. Born as Alessandra's house, it was completely renovated in 2024 to become a luxurious 160-square-meter apartment that accommodates 2/4 people.

The apartment consists of:
- Large living room with kitchenette
- Indoor patio with tables and chairs and lounge chairs
- A double bedroom with a private bathroom with shower
- Second double bedroom with private bathroom with shower and laundry area
neighborhood_overview:
The Winter Garden is located in the historic center, in the characteristic Via Marsala in the San Vitale district. Right in front of the characteristic arcades, the apartment is in a very central area, a 4-minute walk from the Two Towers and a short walk from the old Jewish Ghetto and Via Zamboni, the street where the historic Bologna Universities are located.
This neighborhood has plenty of places to have lunch or aperitif, ice cream shops and supermarkets, and lots of clothing or craft shops.
host_about: Bolognese da sempre amo la mia città e conoscere nuove persone dal mondo. Per me viaggiare significa sentirsi a casa, per questo il mio appartamento è stato ristrutturato e arredato con amore e attenzione.

name: Spacious Apartment x5 with two balconies!
description:
Spacious 150sqm apartment, perfect for 5 people, located on the fourth floor of a building with a communal garden and lift.
The apartment is located in a convenient position for any type of stay. Close to Giardini Margherita and the Sant'Orsola-Malpighi Hospital, it is ideal for those wishing to visit Bologna and its surroundings: crossing the porticoes of Santo Stefano, you arrive at the Two Towers, an ideal starting point for exploring the wonders of the city and all points of interest.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in the elegant Santo Stefano district not far from the entrance to the Giardini Margherita, the historic green lung of Bologna, always active with kiosks and activities for sports lovers and from Porta Santo Stefano which gives access to the city centre. The area is widely served by bars, food shops, pharmacies and means of transport. With a short walk through the porticoes of Santo Stefano you arrive at the Two Towers and the Piazza delle Sette Chiese and the points of greatest interest present in the most historic part of the quadrilateral. Present shortly after the Santo Stefano gate is the Baraccano complex with its small theater and further on the historic Duse Theatre.

Main distances from the city's points of interest:
- Via dell 'Indipendenza (shopping street): 30 minutes by public transport;
- MAMbo (Museum of Modern Art): 37 minutes by public transport;
- Piazza Maggiore: 22 minutes by public transport;
- Basilica of San Petronio: 19 minut
host_about: Amante del turismo e dell'ospitalità.

Enjoy a stylish vacation in this apartment in the heart of the historic center.
Tired of traveling with family or friends and always having to sleep on a sofa bed in the living room?
This apartment, with its 4 rooms, guarantees comfort and privacy to everyone.
In addition, it is in the center, in one of the most elegant and stately neighborhoods in Bologna, with its perfectly preserved historic buildings.

100% Bolognese! Amo la mia città, mi piace viaggiare, la cucina e condividere esperienze.

name: Bologna Artist's House
description: Enjoy a quiet holiday in style, art and relaxation a stone's throw from Piazza Maggiore and Le due Torri. Spacious and bright, quiet flat in an elegant old building, under the typical Bolognese porticoes. Perfect for leisure and tourism, but also for study or work for 2/5 people, close to the most lively areas of the city.
neighborhood_overview: "Santo Stefano" is a historic district of Bologna, very central and very quiet. The heart of the neighborhood is undoubtedly Piazza Santo Stefano, one of the symbolic places of the city, adjacent to Piazza Maggiore and Le due Torri, where you can admire the complex of the "Seven Churches". Although the area is full of historical places to visit, there is no shortage of places to enjoy going for an aperitifs or dinner.
host_about: Ciao, insegno storia del cinema all’Università di Bologna. Ho passato lunghi periodi all’estero e amo incontrare persone di diversi paesi e diverse lingue, anche se ora mi dedico al lavoro e alla famiglia. Sono una persona riservata e questa abitazione rispecchia il mio amore per gli ambienti poetici e protetti. Qui ho dipinto per diversi anni prima di trasferirmi poco fuori porta. Perciò ho chiamato l’appartamento “casa d’artista”.

name: Attic Persichetto with stunning view of Bologna
description:
Relax and recharge in this oasis of tranquility and elegance in the hills of Bologna, just 10 minutes from the city, within the iconic San Luca arcades.

The apartment with a terrace has been completely renovated and it is located on the road to San Luca, within the 19th-century manor house.

Proudly part of Homeby's collection, this accommodation is lovingly managed by our team to ensure a wonderful stay and maintaining its authentic charm.

Nearby, on Via Zaragoza, which is 900 meters away, there are pharmacies, shops, tobacco shops, bars, trattorias, ice-cream parlors

Numerous green spaces in the area: such as Villa Spada, Villa Benni and Talon Park
host_about:
Each property we manage holds a special place in our hearts, ready to reveal its unique story to you.

The house is located in the historical heart of Bologna, surrounded by medieval streets and characteristic arcades. A short walk from Piazza Maggiore, you can admire monuments such as the Basilica of San Petronio and the Palazzo del Podestà.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in via Azzo Gardino 1, one of the areas best served by means of transport and personal services. The accommodation is located a 9-minute walk from the Paladozza sports complex and just a 5-minute walk from the 11 September park which offers wonderful shows with music in summer. Furthermore, just a 1-minute walk away you can find the Sala Cervi cinema which offers a program of films in the original language. A few steps away is Piazzetta Pasolini, home of the film library which offers a local farmers' market every Saturday in winter and Monday in summer. If you wish to go shopping, a 1-minute walk from the property is Via Marconi which offers clothing shops, bars, groceries and much more. As for gastronomy, at the herb market it is possible to find restaurants and food stalls with Bolognese specialties.

description:
Authentic and Modern apartment in the heart of the historic center of Bologna

The house with its Unique Design and Bright Spaces is composed of
-1 Spacious entrance
-1 Comfortable living room with sofa bed and vintage arcade
-1 Top level kitchen fully equipped

neighborhood_overview:
Historic Architecture:
Via Fondazza is famous for its elegant ancient houses with porticos, a distinctive feature of Bologna. The porticos provide shelter from the sun and rain, making it pleasant to stroll in any weather.

Giorgio Morandi's House:
Just a few steps from Via Fondazza 11 is the house where the famous painter Giorgio Morandi lived. Today, it is a museum displaying the artist's works and personal objects, offering an intimate glimpse into his life and work.

Charming Streets and Alleys:
The narrow, cobblestone streets of the neighborhood create a charming and romantic atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing walk. The alleys are filled with artisanal shops, art galleries, and historic boutiques.

Local Life:
The neighborhood is lively and frequented by both residents and university students. You'll find numerous cafes, bars, and restaurants where you can taste traditional Bolognese cuisine, such as the famous tagliatelle al ragù

description:
Experience modern comfort and convenience at Due Agosto Suites and Apartments in Bologna. This ground-floor apartment, just minutes from Bologna Centrale Station, features three ensuite rooms with stylish amenities, self-check-in, and street parking. Ideal for a comfortable and convenient stay.

neighborhood_overview: Due Agosto Suites and Apartments are located just outside the Limited Traffic Zone (ZTL), next to Bologna Centrale Station, making it an ideal base for exploring the city. The vibrant neighborhood of Bolognina offers a blend of cultural richness and modern conveniences. You'll be within walking distance of historical landmarks such as Piazza Maggiore, Le Due Torri (Asinelli and Garisenda Towers), and the Basilica di San Petronio. Discover the academic atmosphere at the University of Bologna and explore the Archiginnasio of Bologna. For a taste of local life, visit the Mercato Bolognina or the Quadrilatero Market, known for its fresh produce and Bolognese cuisine, including the famous Tagliatelle al Ragù. Art enthusiasts will appreciate the nearby MAMbo (Museum of Modern Art of Bologna). The neighborhood is perfect for evening strolls, where you can immerse yourself in the lively atmosphere and discover local gems. Whether you're here for the sights, the food, or the culture, Due Agosto

name: 2 camere separate | Luminoso appartamento per 6
description:
Welcome to our three-room apartment next to Ospedale Sant'Orsola, in a quiet and peaceful area of Bologna.

The apartment has air conditioning, guaranteeing a comfortable stay in any season. It offers ample space and can accommodate up to 6 people.

Its strategic location allows you to easily reach the city center thanks to the many connections available.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is quiet and well stocked with every comfort, making your stay even more enjoyable.

It is located next to the SOUTH entrance of Hall 1 of the Sant'Orsola Hospital and a 12-minute drive from the Fair.

Despite being located on the second floor without an elevator, access is easy and there are paid parking lots right next to the entrance, offering comfort for those traveling by car.
